segments.text: Timekeeper ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼...

segments.text: Ahh ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: Haahh ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 하아...

segments.text: We can't leave Timekeeper inside alone! If we break the wall now, we can still ...
segments.speaker: Special Team Captain
segments.translation: 타임키퍼를 혼자 안에 두고 갈 수는 없어! 지금 벽을 부수면 아직...

segments.text: No, we cannot get in touch with Vertin yet. Without her location, they may get hurt from the blast.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 안 돼요, 지금 버틴과 연락이 닿지 않아 어디에 있는지 알 수 없어요. 벽을 폭파했다간 휩쓸릴지도 모릅니다.

segments.text: The black smoke ...! Watch out! Uggh, uggh!
segments.speaker: Special Team Member Ⅰ
segments.translation: 검은 연기가...! 조심해! 으윽, 으아!

segments.text: Captain, we needa stay away from the wall! It's too dangerous inside, some of us are affected by enemy's incantation!
segments.speaker: Special Team Member Ⅱ
segments.translation: 대장님, 벽에서 멀리 떨어져야 합니다! 안쪽은 너무 위험해요, 우리 중 일부가 적의 주문에 영향을 받고 있습니다!

segments.text: Then find the nearest window and get in ... we may surround the enemy! Timekeeper must not be caught by the Manus!
segments.speaker: Special Team Captain
segments.translation: 그럼 가장 가까운 창문을 찾아서 들어가... 적을 포위할 수 있을 거야! 타임키퍼가 재건의 손에게 잡히면 안 돼!

segments.text: Look, bring all your weapons.
segments.speaker: Schneider'S Man
segments.translation: 자, 무기 전부 가져와.

segments.text: Yeah we break out together, with them.
segments.speaker: Schneider'S Man
segments.translation: 그래, 우리 다 같이 탈출하자. 그들과 함께.

segments.text: Aha? A group of masked men at the main entrance are rushing over. Oh no! they ... they will see us!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아하? 정문에 있던 가면을 쓴 사람들이 이쪽으로 달려오고 있어. 아, 안 돼! 저들이... 저들이 우리를 발견할 거야!

segments.text: We should go.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 가야 해요.

segments.text: ... What?!
segments.speaker: Special Team Captain

segments.text: When Timekeeper is absent, chief assistant Sonetto will be the first-in-command.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼가 부재중일 때는 제1조수인 소네트에게 최고지휘권이 있습니다.

segments.text: Going back now is like lambs to the slaughter. It will only ruin the last chance to rescue the Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다시 들어가는 건 호랑이 굴에 제 발로 찾아가는 셈이죠, 그럼 타임키퍼를 구출해낼 실낱같은 희망마저 끊어버리는 겁니다.

segments.text: The enemy is after us. We are still in danger. It will only cost us more if we act on impulse.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 적들이 우리를 추적 중이니 아직 안심하긴 이릅니다. 충동적인 결정으로 화를 키워서는 안돼요.

segments.text: But ...!
segments.speaker: Special Team Member
segments.translation: 하지만...!

segments.text: Please trust the Timekeeper.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼를 믿으세요.

segments.text: She will do her best not to put herself in danger.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 분명 위험해지지 않도록 스스로 최선을 다할 거예요.

segments.text: And the Manus will also want to know why the Timekeeper is immune to the "Storm".
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재건도 타임키퍼가 왜 폭풍우에 면역인지 궁금하겠죠.

segments.text: We need to make a rescue plan as soon as we are safe and get her out!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 위험에서 벗어나는 즉시 구출 계획을 세워서... 반드시 타임키퍼를 구해냅시다!

segments.text: Copy that!
segments.speaker: Special Team Captain
segments.translation: 알겠습니다!

segments.text: Found them!!
segments.speaker: The Manus Rioter
segments.translation: 찾았다!!

segments.text: The rioters are here! Miss Sotheby, the car once hit by the "Heaven Apostle", is it still working?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 폭도가 쫓아왔어요! 소더비 씨, 아까 천국의 사도를 맞은 차가 아직 작동할까요?

segments.text: Hm ... I have no idea ... It's also my first time taking the "Auto Island" ... I used to travel with Hippogriff Rogero ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 음... 잘 모르겠어... 나도 오토 아일랜드를 타는 건 처음이거든... 예전엔 히포그리프 로제로와 함께 여행했었는데...

segments.text: It still works! But the engine needs a moment!
segments.speaker: Special Team Captain
segments.translation: 아직 작동해! 하지만 엔진이 잠깐 시간이 필요해!

segments.text: This is all because of you! Stop!
segments.speaker: The Manus Rioter
segments.translation: 이 모든 게 너 때문이야! 그만해!

segments.text: Everybody, get ready to fight!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 모두들, 싸울 준비하세요!

segments.text: Come on, come on, we are all counting on you buddy!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 자, 자, 우리 모두 자네를 믿고 있다고, 친구!

segments.text: Just a little bit ...
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 조금만 더...

segments.text: The engine's ... on!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 엔진이... 켜졌다!

segments.text: Wow ... is this also the great arcanum? Next time, please teach me how to master it!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 와... 이것도 대단한 마도술인가요? 다음에는 저에게도 어떻게 익히는 건지 가르쳐 주세요!

segments.text: Everybody get in the car! I'm afraid the noise will get us new company.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다들 얼른 타세요! 방금 소동 때문에 또 다른 추격병이 따라붙을지도 몰라요.

segments.text: Miss Sotheby, could we ... stay at your house for the moment?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 소더비 씨, 실례지만... 당신 집에서 잠시 머물 수 있을까요?

segments.text: Stay? Really? That's awesome!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 머물러? 정말? 완전 좋은데!

segments.text: I always plan to invite a friend to my place. Everything is ready. Just ... just need a friend ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 항상 친구를 우리 집에 초대할 계획을 세우고 있어. 모든 준비는 다 됐어. 그냥... 그냥 친구만 있으면 되는데...

segments.text: Mr. Karson would certainly not agree, but I will convince him! Please believe me!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨는 분명히 동의하지 않으시겠지만, 제가 설득해볼게요! 저를 믿어주세요!

segments.text: Everyone get on board, don't get left behind. Miss Sotheby, please lead the way.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 모두 탑승해, 뒤처지지 마. 소테비 양, 길을 안내해 주세요.

segments.text: Sure! No problem!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 물론이야! 문제없어!

segments.text: Oops, Miss reeling, you stepped on my skirt. ... Well, I have a lot of potions hidden here, umm ... If they're broken, I'm over.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 앗, 릴링 씨, 제 치마를 밟으셨어요. ... 음, 여기에 물약을 많이 숨겨뒀는데... 만약 깨지면 전 끝장이에요.

segments.text: ... Sorry.
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: ... 미안해.

segments.text: Whew! Thank goodness this APPLe doesn't take much space.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 휴... 저 APPLe은 공간을 많이 안 차지해서 다행이네요.

segments.text: They are behind us! Hmm, the rear view mirror is really something.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 뒤에 있어! 음, 백미러가 정말 쓸모있네.

segments.text: Let's move! Everyone sit tight, grab everything in your reach!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 출발한다! 모두 단단히 붙잡고, 손에 닿는 건 다 챙겨!

segments.text: These are the woods we passed before.  Mr. Karson said there are many terrible things hiding here ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 여기는 우리가 전에 지나간 숲이야. 카슨 씨가 말하길 이곳에는 무서운 것들이 많이 숨어있다고 했어...

segments.text: Miss Sonetto was chased by a group of ghost-like monsters! Oh, I seem to have read about them in The Guide to Monsters with Good Temper.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 소네트 씨가 유령 같은 괴물 무리에게 쫓겼어요! 아, 그 괴물들에 대해서는 《성격 좋은 괴물 안내서》에서 읽어본 것 같아요.

segments.text: Yes! Right under this tree, after we drove away the scoundrels, Miss Sonetto joined us.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 맞아! 바로 이 나무 아래에서, 우리가 그 악당들을 쫓아낸 후에 소네트 씨가 우리와 합류했어.

segments.text: This is where the friendship between Sotheby and Miss Sonetto begins! Am I right, Miss Sonetto?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 소더비와 소네트 양의 우정이 시작되는 곳이 바로 여기야! 맞지, 소네트 양?

segments.text: ... Miss Sonetto?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: ... 소네트 씨?

segments.text: Are you ... crying?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 혹시... 울고 있는 거야?

segments.text: Oh ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: You're back, Miss Druvis.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 돌아오셨군요, 드루비스 양.

segments.text: He looks at the cage made of thorns. Two people are locked inside, wordless.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 가시덩굴로 만들어진 우리를 바라본다. 그 안에 두 사람이 갇혀 있고, 아무 말도 하지 않는다.

segments.text: What you brought back is as satisfying as expected, Miss Druvis.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 가져온 것이 예상대로 만족스럽군, 드루비스 양.

segments.text: ... Is that right?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 그런가?

segments.text: What do you mean by right?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 옳다는 게 무슨 뜻이야?

segments.text: They are not good people, Miss Druvis. One is a traitor, and the other, a bureaucrat.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그들은 좋은 사람들이 아니에요, 드루비스 양. 한 명은 배신자고, 다른 한 명은 관료죠.

segments.text: You've done it right for all the blinded ones.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 눈이 먼 모든 이들을 위해 올바른 일을 해냈군.

segments.text: ... I don't care whether they are good or not.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 그들이 좋든 나쁘든 상관없어.

segments.text: I just want to know ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 난 그냥 알고 싶을 뿐이야...

segments.text: ... Is it really the right thing to do?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 정말 옳은 일일까?

segments.text: Of course not.
segments.translation: 당연히 아니죠.

segments.text: Shall we meet Lady Vertin as equals at the conference table?
segments.translation: 회의 테이블에서 버틴 씨와 동등한 눈높이로 대화해보도록 하죠.

segments.text: Better treatment she deserveth.
segments.translation: 더 나은 대접을 받아야 할 분이니까요.

segments.text: I have been seeking a chance to talk to you from an equal position.
segments.translation: 그동안 여러분과 이렇게 대등한 위치에서 대화할 기회를 찾고 있었습니다.

segments.text: The name is Arcana.
segments.translation: 저는 아르카나라고 합니다.

segments.text: Hello.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안녕.

segments.text: The leader behind Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 손의 배후 리더.

segments.text: Thou art acquainted with us.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 너는 우리를 알고 있구나.

segments.text: How wonderful. I am pleased.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 정말 좋군. 기쁘다.

segments.text: Lady Vertin, here is an official offer that you joinest Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴 양, 재건의 손에 합류해달라는 공식 제안서입니다.

segments.text: Ms. Arcana ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 아르카나 씨...

segments.text: Why?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜지?

segments.text: Why? It's simple.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 왜냐고? 간단해.

segments.text: I simply adore thy visage, emotionless in each "Storm".
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 폭풍우 속에서도 변하지 않는 너의 무표정한 얼굴이 정말 사랑스러워.

segments.text: I adore that which shineth in gold, nestled in thy cranium.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그대의 두개골 안에 자리한, 황금빛으로 빛나는 것을 사랑하노라.

segments.text: Thy flesh and blood belongen to us, if only a fraction of an ounce.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 너의 살과 피는 우리 것이다. 비록 한 온스의 일부에 불과할지라도.

segments.text: Do I have the right to say no?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 나에게 거부할 권리는 있는 건가?

segments.text: Absolutely. As I said, we are in an equal position.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 물론이지. 말했듯이, 우리는 대등한 위치에 있어.

segments.text: I ask that thou answer three questions.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 세 가지 질문에 답해 주길 바란다.

segments.text: Answer me, then thou shalt leave ... lest I ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 대답해라, 그러면 떠나게 해주겠다... 그렇지 않으면...

segments.text: Indulge in thy suffering.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 네 고통에 빠져라.

segments.text: Heh ... You can't. Don't waste your time.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤... 넌 못해. 시간 낭비하지 마.

segments.text: Ms. Schneider, it is you who betrayed us first.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 슈나이더 씨, 먼저 배신한 건 당신이에요.

segments.text: Is that so, Mr. Forget Me Not? It seems ... we have never reached an agreement ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그런가, 물망초 씨? 보아하니... 우리는 한 번도 합의점을 찾지 못했군...

segments.text: After all, your promise was a lie from the very beginning, Ms. Schneider. You should've known what was coming for you.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 결국 당신의 약속은 처음부터 거짓말이었군요, 슈나이더 씨. 당신에게 무슨 일이 닥칠지 알았어야 했는데 말이에요.

segments.text: Heh heh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤...

segments.text: So, what are the three questions?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래서, 당신의 세 가지 질문은 뭐지?

segments.text: And how do you indulge in my suffering?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 내 고통은 어떻게 가져가겠다는 거고?

segments.text: Content thee, my child.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 만족하거라, 내 아이야.

segments.text: The answer will be revealed for both of us.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 답은 우리 둘 다에게 밝혀질 거야.

segments.text: She pulls out countless black lines of slime from her temple. The slime turns into a wand.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그녀는 관자놀이에서 수많은 검은 점액질 선들을 뽑아낸다. 점액질은 지팡이로 변한다.

segments.text: The first question.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 첫 번째 질문이야.

segments.text: What is the ultimate purpose for the Foundation to create the "Storm"?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 재단이 폭풍우를 만든 궁극적인 목적이 뭐야?

segments.text: Wha-what? The Foundation ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 뭐... 뭐라고? 재단이...

segments.text: Isn't the "Storm" created by you ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우는 당신이 만든 게 아닌가...

segments.text: Time is up.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 시간이 다 됐어.

segments.text: I was expecting a better answer.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 더 나은 답변을 기대했는데.

segments.text: Start with her right hand. Her gesture with a gun bothereth me.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 오른손부터 시작해. 총을 든 그 자세가 거슬려.

segments.text: Uggh!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 으악!

segments.text: Schneider!!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더!!

segments.text: Shh. This is too much for her with a broken hand.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 쉿. 손이 부러진 상태로는 너무 무리야.

segments.text: Then, the second question.  The Foundation experiments on the orphans of arcanists. Is that true?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그럼, 두 번째 질문이야. 재단이 마도술사들의 고아들을 대상으로 실험을 한다는 게 사실이야?

segments.text: Yes. We are looking for the arcane antibody immune to the "Storm" ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞아, 우리는... 폭풍우에 면역인 마도학 항체를 찾고 있어...

segments.text: And I am the only successful subject.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 나는 유일한 성공한 실험체야.

segments.text: And the name of that antibody is?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그 항체의 이름은 뭐야?

segments.text: Asymmetric ... Immune Protein G ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 비대칭... 면역 단백질G...

segments.text: A story in an inappropriate time, people call it a lie. Thou shalt not be misled by an abominable worm, Lady Vertin.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 부적절한 시기의 이야기를 사람들은 거짓말이라 부르지. 가증스러운 벌레에게 현혹되어서는 안 되네, 버틴 양.

segments.text: Or her limbs are not my next target.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 아니면 그녀의 팔다리가 내 다음 목표가 아니라는 뜻이지.

segments.text: The last question.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 마지막 질문이야.

segments.text: As the only one who bravest the "Storm" easily, I wonder ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 폭풍우를 쉽게 견뎌낸 유일한 존재로서, 궁금하군...

segments.text: the arcanists thou hast met. How are they?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 네가 만난 마도사들은 어떠했느냐?

segments.text: I will join you ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건에 가입할게...

segments.text: They are not very well, are they?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 저들 상태가 별로 안 좋아 보이는데?

segments.text: ... I rarely meet them. Most of them are deserted.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...만날 일이 거의 없었어. 상당수가 버려졌으니까.

segments.text: In the mental hospital, the correctional institution, the abandoned orphanage, and the streets that no one sets foot on.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 정신병원, 교정시설, 버려진 고아원, 그리고 아무도 발을 들이지 않는 거리에서.

segments.text: We have been deserted by the principles of this world.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 우리는 이 세상의 원리에게 버림받았어.

segments.text: As though we were born to be so ... eccentric ... and marginalized.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 마치 우리가 태생부터... 괴짜이고... 소외받을 운명인 것처럼 말이야.

segments.text: Thine eyes are not blinded, Lady Vertin.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 당신의 눈은 멀지 않았군요, 버틴 양.

segments.text: Welcome home.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 집에 온 걸 환영해.

segments.text: F**k ... It hurts …
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 젠장... 아파...

segments.text: Can you stand up, Miss Schneider? Both your right hand and left leg are injured.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 일어날 수 있나요, 슈나이더 양? 오른손과 왼쪽 다리에 부상을 입으셨네요.

segments.text: Arcana walks to Schneider.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아르카나가 슈나이더에게 다가간다.

segments.text: Get lost! Don't touch my gun!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 꺼져! 내 총에 손대지 마!

segments.text: Rotten roots, croaking toads ... You jerk!!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 썩은 뿌리, 개구리 울음소리... 이 자식아!!

segments.text: Lady Vertin, what do you think of her pistol?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴 님, 그녀의 권총을 어떻게 생각하세요?

segments.text: ... A great one.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 좋은 총이지.

segments.text: Exactly. Which was improved by our finest wandmaker—Druvis III.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 맞아. 우리의 최고 지팡이 제작자인 드루비스 3세가 개량한 거지.

segments.text: Take this.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 이걸 받아.

segments.text: I don't need it!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 필요 없어!

segments.text: And end her life.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그리고 그녀의 목숨을 끊어.

segments.text: Why? I've decided to join you!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜? 이미 너희와 손잡겠다고 했잖아!

segments.text: The three questions are all done. It's already ... already enough!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 질문 세 가지도 이미 끝냈잖아. 이제... 이제 그만해...!

segments.text: Hmm, indeed.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 흠, 그렇군.

segments.text: It is a mission, a new mission showing our welcome to thee.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 임무야, 너를 환영한다는 뜻을 담은 새로운 임무지.

segments.text: Thou hast no right to refuse. Complying is thy only choice.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 거부할 권리는 없다. 따르는 것만이 네가 할 수 있는 유일한 선택이지.

segments.text: Yet, Lady Vertin liketh not this. Then nay it is.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 하지만 버틴 님께서 싫어하신다면, 그럼 안 되겠군요.

segments.text: Yet, Lady Vertin liketh no this. Then nay it is.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 하지만 버틴 님께서 싫어하신다면, 그럼 안 되겠군요.

segments.text: Have an orange.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 오렌지 하나 가져.

segments.text: ... Orange?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...오렌지?

segments.text: Why oranges here ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜... 오렌지가 여기에...?

segments.text: Stop running! You orange thief!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 도망치지 마! 이 오렌지 도둑아!

segments.text: Schneider? How did you become ... so young ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더? 왜 이렇게... 어려진 거야...?

segments.text: Huh? Your clothes. ... Are you from the downtown?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 어? 네 옷... 혹시 시내 출신이야?

segments.text: Ah ... I see. You are the friend that my sis said helping us pick oranges.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아... 알겠어. 너가 언니가 말한 그 친구구나, 오렌지 따는 걸 도와준다는.

segments.text: Come with me. We have to hurry up. Uncle Cannavale is going to transport the oranges to town tonight!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 나랑 같이 와. 서둘러야 해. 카나발레 아저씨가 오늘 밤에 오렌지를 마을로 운반하실 거거든!

segments.text: Where ... where am I?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 여긴... 대체 어디지?

segments.text: Don't be afraid. You can cut the oranges when you climb there. I'll grab you tight!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 무서워하지 마. 올라가서 오렌지를 따면 돼. 내가 꽉 잡아줄게!

segments.text: The orange tree feels so real—the warm breeze, the familiar scent ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 오렌지나무의 촉감이 진짜 같네... 살짝 더운 듯한 바람, 익숙한 향기...

segments.text: ... I'm here to pick oranges.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...난 오렌지를 따러 온 거야.

segments.text: Eh hey.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어, 안녕.

segments.text: Uggh ... uggh ... huh  ... huh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 으으... 으으... 하아... 하아...

segments.text: My lord, it's not fair. You're shooting someone seriously injured ... Oh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 주인님, 이건 불공평해요. 심각한 부상을 입은 사람을 쏘다니... 아...

segments.text: Wake up! Come to your senses!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 정신 차려! 제정신을 찾아!

segments.text: Ah, thank you for wiping the mud off my face.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아, 내 얼굴에 먼지가 묻었었구나. 닦아줘서 고마워.

segments.text: Are you really here to help us pick oranges? You don't look very skilled. Or is all the city people like that?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 정말 오렌지 따는 걸 도우러 온 거야? 별로 솜씨가 좋아 보이지 않는데. 아니면 도시 사람들이 다 그런 건가?

segments.text: Who says I'm not skilled? Observe. Let me pick up that big orange at the top for you.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내가 실력이 없다고 누가 그래? 지켜봐. 저 위에 있는 큰 오렌지를 따다 줄게.

segments.text: Just climb up here, take a small jump ... then I'll get it ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 저기 위로 올라가서 살짝 점프하면... 닿을 수 있을 거야...

segments.text: ... Hey! I got it!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...이것 봐! 땄어!

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 으으윽...

segments.text: Huh ... So it feels like this ... to be shot by my own bullet ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 흠... 이런 기분이구나... 내 총알에 맞는다는 게...

segments.text: It's not over yet ... my lord. Then ... don't blame me for giving no mercy ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아직 끝나지 않았어... 주인님. 그럼... 용서 없이 덤벼도 원망하지 마...

segments.text: Pap! Pap! Pap!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 탕 탕 탕!!

segments.text: Your back is bloody red ...  Don't you feel the pain?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 등이 새빨갛게 피투성이야... 아프지도 않아?

segments.text: That son of a b***h! What the hell did she show you?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그 개자식! 도대체 너한테 뭘 보여준 거야?

segments.text: Vertin's back ... such a huge scar on her back. ... How?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴의 등... 등에 이렇게 큰 흉터가... 어떻게 된 거야?

segments.text: Interesting. Interesting. Lines. The moon, The eye. What is it?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 흥미롭군. 흥미로워. 선들이... 달, 그리고 눈. 이게 뭐지?

segments.text: How did you fall from the tree? Your back is bleeding.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 어떻게 나무에서 떨어진 거야? 등에서 피가 나고 있어.

segments.text: I ... I think I just saw a critter ... Didn't watch my step when driving it away.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아... 방금 크리터를 한 마리 본 거 같아... 쫓아내려다가 실수로 떨어져 버렸어.

segments.text: Critter ... ahh, I know it. That's the little animal that didn't take the ark, right? I often find them in the bushes!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 크리터... 아, 알겠어. 방주에 타지 않은 작은 동물들 말이지? 덤불에서 자주 발견하거든!

segments.text: You often see strange creatures ... Are you also an arcanist?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그걸 볼 수 있다고...? 너도 마도학자야?

segments.text: I'm ... umm ...
segments.speaker: Schneider

segments.text: Ah, the critters are making trouble now! Wait a minute. I will deal with them soon.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아, 크리터가 또 말썽을 부리네! 잠깐만, 내가 금방 해결할게.

segments.text: Here you are.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 여기 있었구나.

segments.text: It's the big orange. Thank you for helping us. Let's have it together! I want to hear the story about the world outside!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 큰 오렌지네요. 도와주셔서 고마워요. 같이 먹어요! 바깥세상 이야기를 듣고 싶어요!

segments.text: In the future ... will you also come to town, Schneider?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 앞으로... 슈나이더도 마을에 오게 될까?

segments.text: I ... I have no idea. I've never left here. But my uncles have gone to the United States many years ago.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 나... 나는 모르겠어. 여기서 나가본 적이 없거든. 하지만 삼촌들은 몇 년 전에 미국으로 갔어.

segments.text: My family would also like to go. I heard that ... it's completely different from here.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우리 가족도 가고 싶어해. 들어보니... 여기랑은 완전히 다르다던데.

segments.text: It's the real new world.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 진짜 새로운 세계야.

segments.text: There are wonders. Full measure of the blessing will be given. Sins will be forgiven. The god there ... loves the world.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 기적이 있어. 축복이 온전히 주어질 거야. 죄는 용서받을 거고. 그곳의 신은... 세상을 사랑하고 있어.

segments.text: Umm? Why don't you eat, Miss Vertin?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 음? 버틴 씨는 왜 안 드세요?

segments.text: I don't feel like it.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내키지 않아.

segments.text: I've been wondering ... don't you think this orange ... tastes bitter?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 실은 계속 물어보고 싶었는데... 이 오렌지 말이야... 좀 쓰지 않아?

segments.text: Why not shoot? My lord ... huh ... just one last shot. ... Why did you stop! Why!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 왜 쏘지 않는 거야? 주인님... 하... 마지막 한 발만... 왜 멈춘 거야! 왜!

segments.text: Don't I deserve the right to ... die fast?!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 나에게는... 빨리 죽을 권리조차 없다는 거야?!

segments.text: Or did God finally forgive me. ... He allowed me ... to stay alive!!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아니면 신이 드디어 날 용서해 주신 건가. ... 신께서 날... 살아있게 해주신 거야!!

segments.text: Schneider?! Why are you covered in blood ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더?! 어쩌다 피투성이가 된 거야...

segments.text: The pistol ... No, no, no! Don't come over!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 총... 아, 안돼! 가까이 오지 마...!

segments.text: The pistol ... no, no, no! Don't come over!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 총... 아, 안돼! 가까이 오지 마...!

segments.text: This is the final chance.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이번이 마지막이다.

segments.text: One shall fall, one shall stand.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하나는 쓰러지고, 하나는 살아남는다.

segments.text: Schneider dashes to Vertin, her chest bumping into the quivering pistol.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더가 버틴에게 달려가며, 그녀의 가슴이 떨리는 권총에 부딪힌다.

segments.text: Pap!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 탕!

segments.text: Schneider?! Why ...!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더...?! 어째서...!

segments.text: My lord ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 주인님...

segments.text: ... Not now.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: ... 지금은 안 돼.

segments.text: I'm sorry.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 미안해.

segments.text: Oops, right in the heart.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 앗, 심장에 정통으로 맞았네.

segments.text: Acccidently, though, our new member is quite the sharpshooter.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그런데 우연히도, 우리 새 멤버는 꽤나 명사수더라고.

segments.text: Where are you going? Miss Druvis.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어디 가시는 거예요? 드루비스 씨.

segments.text: To where I go.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내가 가는 곳으로.

segments.text: This body, thou hast any idea? Miss Druvis.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 이 몸에 대해, 뭔가 아는 게 있나? 드루비스 양.

segments.text: Send her back to where she belongs.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그녀를 원래 있던 곳으로 돌려보내.

segments.text: So that they know Miss Vertin's choice.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 버틴 양의 선택을 알 수 있도록 말이야.

segments.text: How long before we get to the manor? Miss Sotheby, we've been driving for more than 40 minutes.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 저택까지 얼마나 더 걸리나? 소테비 양, 벌써 40분 넘게 달리고 있는데.

segments.text: Soon around the corner ahead and we're out, then ... huh!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 저기 모퉁이만 돌면 나갈 수 있어, 그러면... 어?

segments.text: Hah? What's that shadow? It's moving! And there's water on it ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어? 저 그림자가 뭐야? 움직이고 있어! 그리고 물이 묻어있어...

segments.text: Waffle, that's the Manus Vindictae's believer! Get around now, don't let them see us!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 이런, 재건의 손 신도들이네요. 어서 방향을 바꾸죠, 저들에게 들키면 안 돼요!

segments.text: No! We can't turn around now.
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 안 돼! 지금 돌아갈 수는 없어.

segments.text: No! They found us!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 안 돼! 들켰어!

segments.text: Let's fight. Put an end to all that's happening in this ridiculous forest.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 싸우자. 이 터무니없는 숲에서 일어나는 모든 일들을 끝장내자.

segments.text: We must not let the Manus know where we are going.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우리가 어디로 가는지 재건에게 들켜선 안돼요.

segments.text: Copy. Let's make it fast!
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 알겠다. 빨리 끝내자!

segments.text: There should be no other enemies. Are you alright? Is anybody hurt?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다른 적들은 없을 거예요. 괜찮으세요? 다친 사람 있나요?

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: APPLe

segments.text: Are you okay, Mr. APPLe?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 괜찮아요, 미스터 APPLe?

segments.text: I got accidentally splashed by their slime. It must contain a high concentration of toxins ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 아까 제 부주의로 녀석들의 독액에 맞았어요. 안에 독소가 많이 들어 있을 텐데...

segments.text: Whoa ... you are going mouldy!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 우와... 곰팡이가 슬고 있잖아!

segments.text: You need the antidote made from leeches, glass lizard blood, black fern root and at least two phoenix heart nerves!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 거머리와 유리도마뱀 피, 검은 고사리 뿌리, 그리고 최소 두 개의 불사조 심장 신경으로 만든 해독제가 필요해!

segments.text: They are very hard to find, but fortunately, I have them all!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 찾기가 정말 어려운데, 다행히 전부 다 가지고 있어요!

segments.text: Thank you. But this APPLe might need a little bit of ... Mancozeb.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 감사합니다만, 저 APPLe에게 필요한 건... 만코제브입니다만.

segments.text: "Mango Cub"? What's that?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 망고 컵"? 그게 뭐야?

segments.text: Ahh ... ahem ...
segments.speaker: APPLe

segments.text: Huh! Mr. APPLe passed out!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어! APPLe 씨가 기절했어!

segments.text: Don't worry, don't worry! I've got all kinds of potion materials at my house. I'll get them when we're back!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 걱정 마, 걱정 마! 우리 집에 온갖 종류의 포션 재료들이 다 있어. 돌아가면 가져올게!

segments.text: After the "auto island" passing through ten different gardens, they finally get to the gate of the manor.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 열 개의 서로 다른 정원을 지나온 자동 섬이 드디어 저택의 문에 도착했어.

segments.text: Phew! Finally got home!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 휴! 드디어 집에 도착했어!

segments.text: Hmm? That's weird. Where is everybody? Anyone there! Someone needs an antidote!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어? 이상하네. 다들 어디 간 거야? 거기 누구 없어! 해독제가 필요한 사람이 있다고!

segments.text: Is that ... a unicorn on the wall?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 벽에 보이는 저건... 유니콘인가요?

segments.text: Ah, it turned around ... I thought it was a statue, but it is still alive?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 앗, 고개를 이쪽으로 돌렸어요... 조각상인 줄 알았는데, 살아 있었군요?

segments.text: It's not a statue. It is the Quiet Ravenheart.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 조각상이 아니야. 그건 조용한 레이븐하트야.

segments.text: The sorcerer and heretic ... oh God, forgive me, Sweet Mary mother of Jesus ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 마법사와 이단자... 오, 하느님, 저를 용서해 주소서. 예수님의 어머니이신 성모 마리아여...

segments.text: Ahhh! What has flown over! God bless us!
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 아아아! 뭐가 날아간 거야! 하느님 우리를 보살펴 주세요!

segments.text: Oh, don't be afraid! Hahaha ... that's my dearest Sasana! You are here to welcome me!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아, 무서워하지 마! 하하하... 내 사랑하는 사사나구나! 날 맞이하러 온 거지!

segments.text: Sasana? Well, this is the first time I have seen so many arcane creatures and plants for real ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 사사나라... 이렇게 많은 마도술 생물들과 식물들을 실제로 본 건 처음이네요...

segments.text: Heh heh, it's a mini Schnellgeiste. My father found it near the Blue Ridge Mountains in Braddock Heights.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 헤헤, 작은 슈넬가이스트야. 아버지가 브래독 하이츠의 블루 리지 산맥 근처에서 발견하신 거야.

segments.text: Don't worry. It no longer sucks human blood. It's my good friend now, and will welcome me home every time!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마. 이제 더 이상 사람 피를 빨지 않아. 내 좋은 친구가 됐거든, 내가 집에 올 때마다 반겨줄 거야!

segments.text: Speaking of which ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그런데 말이야...

segments.text: It's so weird. Where are all the servants at the door today? Mr. Karson would never allow this ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 정말 이상해. 오늘은 문 앞에 하인들이 왜 아무도 없지? 카슨 씨라면 절대 이런 일을 허락하지 않을 텐데...

segments.text: Mr. Karson! Sotheby is back!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨! 소더비가 돌아왔어요!

segments.text: Mr. Karson?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨?

segments.text: It seems there's no one else but us here.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여기엔 저희 말고 아무도 없는 것 같네요.

segments.text: Well, it's really weird. Forget it. Leave Mr. Karson alone. I have to find the "Mango Carrot" quickly!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 음, 정말 이상해. 뭐 됐어. 카슨 씨는 그냥 내버려 둬. 나는 빨리 망고 당근을 찾아야 해!

segments.text: I will be back soon! Hold on in there, Mr. APPLe!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 금방 돌아올게! 조금만 버텨, APPLe 씨!

segments.text: Hmm ... what Mr. APPLe just mentioned, is it really "Mango Carrot"?
segments.speaker: Special Action Team Captain
segments.translation: 음... 방금 APPLe 씨가 말한 건, 정말 망고 캐럿인가요?

segments.text: I am so sorry. I did not hear it clearly either.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 죄송하지만 저도 제대로 못 들었어요.

segments.text: I made a small cut of his leaf to release venom. Hopefully the toxin will take effect slower ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제가 APPLe의 잎을 조금 잘라서 독을 빼냈어요. 독이 퍼지는 속도를 늦출 수 있으면 좋겠네요...

segments.text: Umm ...
segments.speaker: Marian

segments.text: I think what he said was "Mancozeb," an organometallic fungicide humans apply on plants.
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 그가 말한 건 만코젭이었던 것 같아. 인간들이 식물에 사용하는 유기금속 살균제야.

segments.text: Ma ... Mea ... Mon ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: Huh! Not in the index starting with "M". So, Co ... Coe ... Cost ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어? 'M으로 시작하는 색인에는 없네. 그럼, Co... Coe... Cost...

segments.text: Nothing! How could it be possible?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아무것도 아니야! 그럴 리가 없어!

segments.text: We ... we should have all the potion materials in our warehouse. Is that ... in Latin?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 우리... 우리 창고에 물약 재료는 다 있을 거야. 그건... 라틴어야?

segments.text: What can I do ... huh! I promised to cure Mr. APPLe ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 뭘 할 수 있을까... 어! APPLe 씨를 치료해 주겠다고 약속했는데...

segments.text: Clang.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 덜컹

segments.text: Umm?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 음?

segments.text: Did I hear something?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 뭔가 들린 것 같은데?

segments.text: Clang. Clang.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 철컹. 철컹.

segments.text: Someone is here! What happened? This floor is a private storage area. Servants are strictly forbidden ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 누군가 있네! 무슨 일이야? 이 층은 개인 창고 구역이야. 하인들은 절대 출입금지...

segments.text: And I never met any servant along the way ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그리고 길에서 하인은 한 명도 만나지 못했어...

segments.text: Phew ... around this corner ... I'm just gonna sneak a peek, making no sound ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 휴... 이 모퉁이 너머로... 소리 안 나게 살짝만 엿봐야지...

segments.text: M-Mr. Karson?!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카-카슨 씨?!

segments.text: Miss Sotheby, you're back.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 소더비 양, 돌아왔군요.

segments.text: You ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 당신은...

segments.text: Why are you standing in front of our No. 18 vault?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 왜 우리 18번 금고 앞에 서 있는 거야?

segments.text: I am doing the weekly inventory check. I apologise for not welcoming you in time.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 주간 재고 점검을 하고 있었습니다. 제때 맞이하지 못해 죄송합니다.

segments.text: Umm, however, what happened to your outfit, my lady?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 음, 그런데 아가씨, 옷에 무슨 일이 있었던 건가요?

segments.text: Look at the dust on your cheek, and where is the bow on your left arm? Why do you look like just crawled out of the trenches?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 뺨에 묻은 먼지 좀 봐, 그리고 왼팔의 완장은 어디 갔어? 왜 참호에서 막 기어 나온 것 같은 꼴이야?

segments.text: This ... is terribly bad manners. I hope that Mr. Forget Me Not and the high society you meet today will not think that the Sothebys are a group of savages.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 이건... 정말 예의에 어긋나는 행동이군요. 오늘 만나게 될 포겟 미 낫 씨와 상류사회 분들이 소더비 가문을 야만인 집단으로 생각하지 않기를 바랍니다.

segments.text: Mr. Karson ...!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨...!

segments.text: You're all right. That's great!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 다들 괜찮구나. 정말 다행이야!

segments.text: I haven't found you. And the servants are all ... Is there something wrong with our manor?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 당신을 찾지 못했어요. 그리고 하인들이 모두... 저희 저택에 무슨 문제라도 생긴 건가요?

segments.text: Did the Manus make any trouble?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 재건의 손이 말썽을 부렸나?

segments.text: The Manus? I don't understand, my lady.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 재건의 손이요? 무슨 말씀인지 모르겠습니다, 아가씨.

segments.text: I assure you that the manor has not been disturbed by anyone.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 저택에는 아무도 침입하지 않았다고 장담합니다.

segments.text: However, after dinner, all the servants somehow got acute gastrointestinal inflammation. Your favourite gardener, Nick, is in hospital now.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 하지만 저녁 식사 후에 하인들이 모두 급성 위장염에 걸렸습니다. 당신이 아끼시던 정원사 닉도 지금 병원에 입원해 있어요.

segments.text: What! How could that happen? ... And you ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 뭐! 어떻게 그런 일이? ... 그리고 당신은...

segments.text: I was waiting for Master's phone call while they were having dinner.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 주인님이 식사하시는 동안 전화를 기다리고 있었습니다.

segments.text: Don't worry, my lady. I have double checked the food. I assume that it's just because of the inappropriate preservation.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 걱정 마세요, 아가씨. 음식은 두 번 확인했습니다. 아마 보관이 제대로 되지 않아서 그런 것 같습니다.

segments.text: Hah! If it's not those bad guys, the Manus, then I have nothing to worry about!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 하! 재건의 손 같은 나쁜 놈들만 아니라면 걱정할 게 없어!

segments.text: That's it for now, Mr. Karson. I need to find the "Coco Carrot"!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 일단 여기까지예요, 카슨 씨. 저는 코코 당근을 찾아야 해요!

segments.text: "Coco Carrot"?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 코코 캐럿"?

segments.text: Yes, that remedy will save my friend's life! They are all waiting for me in the lobby. It's a close call!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 맞아, 그 치료제가 내 친구의 생명을 구할 거야! 모두 로비에서 나를 기다리고 있어. 정말 아슬아슬했네!

segments.text: ... I see. But please be at ease, and a decent meal will be prepared for your friends.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: ... 알겠습니다. 하지만 안심하세요, 당신의 친구들을 위해 제대로 된 식사를 준비해드리겠습니다.

segments.text: Thank you! My greatest Mr. Karson!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 고마워요! 나의 위대한 카슨 선생님!

segments.text: Where will the "Coco Banana" be stored?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 코코 바나나는 어디에 보관할 거야?

segments.text: Ohhh!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 오오오!

segments.text: ohh ... it hurts so much. How come there are so many green balls running around in the corridor!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아아... 너무 아파. 복도에 초록색 공들이 왜 이렇게 많이 돌아다니는 거야!

segments.text: Grrrrrr Meow!!
segments.translation: 으르렁 야옹!!

segments.text: Grrrrrr Meow ...? Isn't it the Cactus Cat?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 으르르르 야옹...? 선인장 고양이 아니야?

segments.text: You actually sneaked out while Anna was sick! So, did you come out to steal cactus juice again?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 안나가 아픈 틈을 타서 몰래 빠져나왔구나! 그래서, 또 선인장 즙 훔치러 나온 거야?

segments.text: I will get you drunk right now, or the manor will be messed up again!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 지금 당장 취하게 해드릴게요, 아니면 또 저택이 엉망이 될 거예요!

segments.text: Little devils, I gotcha! Ha ha, I'm quite good!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 꼬마 악마들, 잡았다! 하하, 나 꽤 잘하지!

segments.text: Huh? What's this little bottle next to the barrel? Manco ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어? 통 옆에 있는 이 작은 병은 뭐지? 만코...

segments.text: Ah! Here is the magic "Mancozeb" that can cure all! The kind alchemist Sotheby will not give up any patients!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아! 만병통치약인 마법의 만코젭이 여기 있어! 친절한 연금술사 소테비는 어떤 환자도 포기하지 않을 거야!

segments.text: Thank you, alchemist Sotheby. Mr. APPLe has applied the medicine just now, and Miss Marian found the medicine outside the garden storeroom.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 고마워요, 마도학자 소더비. 그런데 방금 미스터 APPLe에게 약을 먹였어요. 마리안 씨가 정원에 있는 창고 밖에서 약을 찾았답니다.

segments.text: Ah ... there are still many arcanists who are better than me.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아... 저보다 뛰어난 마도술사들이 아직 많이 있어요.

segments.text: But why do you look so serious? This is ...?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 그런데 왜 그렇게 심각한 표정이야? 이건...?

segments.text: Come here, Miss Sotheby.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이리 와보세요, 소더비 씨.

segments.text: The Manus has taken action.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재건이 움직이기 시작했어요.

segments.text: There is a large scale disease outbreak in the city center. The news is on the radio.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 도심에 질병 피해가 광범위하게 발생했다는군요. 지금 라디오에 뉴스가 나오고 있어요.

segments.text: According to the Public Health Service, by 8 p.m. today, 13,469 cases of asphyxiation deaths,
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 공중보건청에 따르면, 오늘 오후 8시까지 질식사 사례가 13,469건,

segments.text: 2,283 confirmed cases of acute respiratory distress syndrome and 181,002 confirmed cases related to gastrointestinal inflammation were reported in 45 regions.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 45개 지역에서 급성 호흡곤란 증후군 확진자 2,283명과 위장관 염증 관련 확진자 181,002명이 보고되었습니다.

segments.text: Patients with the new disease have had such primary symptoms as swallowing difficulties, shortness of breath, and gastrointestinal inflammation. The disease is likely to spread in the areas of residence where the patients live.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 신종 질병 환자들의 주요 증상으로는 연하곤란, 호흡곤란, 위장관 염증 등이 나타났습니다. 이 질병은 환자들이 거주하는 지역을 중심으로 확산될 가능성이 높습니다.

segments.text: It has not yet been confirmed as highly infectious. PHS Commissioned Corps has intervened in food supply control and will report its findings as soon as possible.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 아직 높은 전염성이 있다고 확정되지는 않았습니다. PHS 위임단이 식품 공급 통제에 개입했으며, 가능한 한 빨리 조사 결과를 보고할 예정입니다.

segments.text: The east side of Michigan Avenue in the Loup District, the Gold Coast block in the Near North Side, and the River North neighborhood are the most affected areas.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 루프 지구 미시간 애비뉴 동쪽, 니어 노스 사이드의 골드 코스트 블록, 그리고 리버 노스 지역이 가장 심각한 피해를 입은 지역입니다.

segments.text: We have also received reports from Evanston and Oak Park.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 에반스턴과 오크 파크에서도 보고가 들어왔습니다.

segments.text: Until the source of the disease is identified, we ask that general public refrain from eating at restaurants, cafes, bars and any public places. If not necessary, please do not visit major public hospitals in urban areas.
segments.speaker: Radio Host
segments.translation: 질병의 원인이 밝혀질 때까지, 일반 시민 여러분께서는 식당, 카페, 술집 및 모든 공공장소에서의 식사를 자제해 주시기 바랍니다. 꼭 필요하지 않다면 도심 지역의 주요 종합병원 방문도 피해 주십시오.

segments.text: More than 100,000 people are sick?! Oh my gosh.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 10만 명이 넘는 사람들이 아프다고?! 세상에.

segments.text: You look so angry, Miss Sonetto. Are you okay?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 정말 화나 보여요. 괜찮아요?

segments.text: ... I am fine. The casualties are staggering.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...전 괜찮아요. 사상자가 너무 많네요.

segments.text: How did the Manus do that? These are obviously exogenous diseases.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재건 녀석들이 무슨 짓을 한 걸까요? 외인성 질환인 게 분명한데 말이죠.

segments.text: Could it be ... poison?!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 혹시... 독인가요?!

segments.text: Miss Singing Box said that people who are sick would all have stomach pains ... gastrointestinal inflammation, right?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 미스 싱잉 박스가 그러는데 아픈 사람들은 다 배가 아프대... 위장염 맞지?

segments.text: But even the hypertoxic ash of Peridexion Tree can't cause such a mass casualty ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 하지만 페리덱시온 나무[Peridexion Tree]의 맹독을 쓴다 해도 이렇게 많은 사상자가 발생하진 않아요...

segments.text: And this APPLe's symptom doesn't include gastrointestinal inflammation.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 저 APPLe의 증상에는 위장염이 포함되지 않았습니다.

segments.text: I have recorded the broadcast and ... the Timekeeper's situation, and will report it to the headquarters now.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 방송 내용과... 타임키퍼의 상황을 기록해서 지금 본부에 보고하겠습니다.

segments.text: Whether it is the solution to the "Storm", or the plan to rescue the Timekeeper, we all need the instructions at a higher level .
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 폭풍우의 해결책이든, 타임키퍼 구출 계획이든, 우리 모두에게는 상부의 지시가 필요합니다.

segments.text: Apologies for interrupting.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 방해해서 죄송합니다.

segments.text: Mr. Karson? Ha! Is it time for dinner?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨? 하! 저녁 시간인가요?

segments.text: Yes. Ladies and gentlemen, dinner is ready. Please follow me to the dining room.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 네. 신사 숙녀 여러분, 저녁 식사가 준비되었습니다. 식당으로 안내해드리겠습니다.

segments.text: That's great. Thank you.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좋네요. 고마워요.

segments.text: Do we have Haggis with plum sauce today? I want everyone to try the delicacy my father brought back from Scotland!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 오늘 자두 소스를 곁들인 해기스가 있나요? 아버지가 스코틀랜드에서 가져오신 별미를 모두가 맛봤으면 좋겠어요!

segments.text: Of course my lady. Your favorite lekvar haggis will be served soon.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 물론입니다, 아가씨. 좋아하시는 레크바르 해기스를 곧 준비해드리겠습니다.

segments.text: These dishes are made with the latest seasonal ingredients from the manor. May this wonderful night wash away our distinguished guests' weariness.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 이 요리들은 저택에서 나는 최신 제철 재료로 만든 것입니다. 이 멋진 밤이 귀한 손님들의 피로를 말끔히 씻어드리길 바랍니다.

segments.text: Mr. Karson?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨?

segments.text: What ... what ... what are these?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 뭐... 뭐... 이게 뭐야?

segments.text: These are the appetizers.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 이건 애피타이저야.

segments.text: Or would you like me to introduce them, my lady?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 아니면 제가 소개해드릴까요, 아가씨?

segments.text: The 1919 botrytised sweet wine,  Moulis en Medoc from Chateau Chasse-Spleen, Creamy Orange Caramels with Toffee Pudding, Puffapod in Herring Soup.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 1919년산 귀부 스위트 와인, 샤토 샤스 스플린의 물리 앙 메독, 토피 푸딩을 곁들인 크리미 오렌지 캐러멜, 청어 수프의 퍼파포드입니다.

segments.text: Cream of Watercress Soup, Oysters with Mignonette Sauce, and Dill Barometz.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 미나리 크림수프, 미뇨네트 소스를 곁들인 굴, 그리고 딜 바로메츠입니다.

segments.text: No. That's not what I mean ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아니야. 그런 뜻이 아니라...

segments.text: Are you making a joke? But ... this is not who you are, Mr. Karson. ... I don't understand ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 농담하시는 건가요? 하지만... 이건 카슨 씨답지 않아요. ... 이해할 수 없어요...

segments.text: Huh ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: So ... is that ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그럼... 저건...

segments.text: What do you say is in the bowl in front of you, Mr. Karson? What is it?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 카슨 씨, 앞에 놓인 그릇 안에 뭐가 들어있다고 생각하세요? 그게 뭔가요?

segments.text: Cream of Watercress Soup made of wasabi, blue cheese, watercress, fresh shellfish.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 와사비, 블루치즈, 물냉이, 신선한 조개류로 만든 물냉이 크림수프입니다.

segments.text: Gosh! Mr. Karson, can't you ... can't you see it?!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어머! 카슨 씨, 안 보여요...? 정말 안 보이세요?!

segments.text: If there is anything wrong with the cuisine, please let me know, my lady.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 요리에 문제가 있으시면 언제든 말씀해 주세요, 아가씨.

segments.text: I don't know what's wrong with you, Mr. Karson ... but these are not for dinner, not even food at all!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨, 뭔가 잘못 생각하고 계신 것 같은데... 이건 저녁 식사용이 아니에요, 아니 애초에 음식도 아니라고요!

segments.text: These ... these ... are gold and money!!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이거... 이거... 금이랑 돈이야!!

segments.text: Ms. Vertin doesn't seem to have any appetite.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 버틴 씨는 식욕이 없어 보이네요.

segments.text: Or, do you too, wonder how gold bar steak with wine and boiled silver coin tastes?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아니면 너도 궁금하니? 와인을 곁들인 금괴 스테이크와 삶은 은화가 어떤 맛일지 말이야?

segments.text: Storm Syndrome? That's how you call these pernicious habits from the old society?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: Forget Me Not: 폭풍우 증후군? 구시대의 해로운 관습들을 그렇게 부르는 거야?

segments.text: Sounds like ... the Foundation are so satisfied with how the old society works that you call the current situation a "syndrome".
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 듣자하니... 재단은 기존 사회 체제가 너무 마음에 들어서 현재 상황을 증후군이라고 부르는 모양이네.

segments.text: The Storm Syndrome turned money into food in people's eyes ... It's so ridiculous.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우 증후군이 돈을 사람들에게 음식처럼 보이게 만드는 거라니... 어처구니가 없군.

segments.text: No, you wronged us. We didn't do anything but wait.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아니야, 잘못한 건 너희야. 우리는 그저 기다렸을 뿐이야.

segments.text: This is just the "mutation" before the "Storm". Nothing else. You know it very well.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이건 그냥 폭풍우 전의 변이일 뿐이야. 그 이상도 이하도 아니고. 너도 잘 알고 있잖아.

segments.text: And this "mutation" has turned money into food in people's eyes ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 이번 이상 현상으로 돈이 인간의 눈에 음식으로 비치게 된 거고...

segments.text: How did they eat those gold bars?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그 사람들이 어떻게 금괴를 먹은 거야?

segments.text: It is not easy to cut them off.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들을 끊어내기가 쉽지 않군.

segments.text: Of course not. Gold is no meat or vegetable.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 물론 아니지. 금이 고기나 채소는 아니잖아.

segments.text: But humans, yes, they are impressive. They had somehow worked out a brand new set of tools dealing with the new "food".
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 하지만 인간들은, 그래, 정말 대단해. 새로운 먹이를 다루는 완전히 새로운 도구들을 어떻게든 만들어냈거든.

segments.text: A parer that can pare the rough surface of the gold like a potato; a spray gun that can melt bullion within seconds; a cutting board that can prevent cash from scattering all over the place ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 감자 껍질 벗기듯 금의 거친 표면을 깎아낼 수 있는 칼, 몇 초 만에 금괴를 녹여버릴 수 있는 스프레이 건, 현금이 사방으로 흩어지는 걸 막아주는 도마...

segments.text: There are even cold drinks made from melted Statue of Liberty, for only 50 cents ... Haha, I can't help laughing.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 자유의 여신상을 녹여서 만든 차가운 음료도 있어, 겨우 50센트에... 하하, 웃음이 나오네.

segments.text: But the milk ... was mostly dumped.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 우유는... 대부분 버려졌어.

segments.text: It's not food anymore. I can't experience the lives of people who were sifted out by the "Storm", but I wonder, for them ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이제 음식이 아니야. 폭풍우에 의해 걸러진 사람들의 삶을 경험할 수는 없지만, 그들에게는...

segments.text: What do they do for eating? For paying?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 먹고살려면 뭘 해야 하지? 돈은 어떻게 벌고?

segments.text: In the "Storm", the thing that dominates their lives is still money. How could it be more ridiculous for the time!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우 속에서도 그들의 삶을 지배하는 건 여전히 돈이야. 이 시대치고는 너무 우스꽝스럽지 않아?

segments.text: Why do you blame them? In the "Storm," there is no life.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왜 그들을 그렇게까지 비난하는 거지? 폭풍우 속에서는 제대로 된 삶조차 없는데.

segments.text: No life ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 생명이 없어...

segments.text: You look very sad, Miss Vertin. I do not understand.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 버틴 양, 매우 슬퍼 보이는군요. 이해할 수 없어요.

segments.text: This burnt branch ... should have come from a rowan tree, right?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 검게 그을린 이 나뭇가지도... 원래는 마가목에서 온 거겠지?

segments.text: I have seen this tree in Ireland and southwest England. It is often called "Quickbeam," derived from Old German ... means "stay alive."
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아일랜드와 잉글랜드 남서부에서 이 나무를 본 적이 있어. 그곳에선 'Quickbeam이라고 불리는데, 고대 독일어로 살아 있음을 의미하지.

segments.text: Rowan is full of vitality. Even if it is transplanted from Europe to North America, it grows vigorously and stretches into a vast forest.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마가목은 생명력이 강해. 먼 유럽이나 북아메리카에서도 왕성하게 자라나 광활한 숲을 이뤘어.

segments.text: In the most dangerous days in the Celtic calendar, people would wear garlands and berries of rowan to pray for its blessing for vitality.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 켈트 달력에서 가장 불운하다고 여겨지는 날이면, 사람들은 마가목의 화환과 열매를 몸에 지니고 다니면서 마가목의 가호가 있기를 기도해.

segments.text: However, an unexpected fire destroyed all of them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그런데 갑작스럽게 발생한 화재가 모든 걸 불태워 버리고 말았지.

segments.text: Just like the "Storm." It's there for no reason.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이유 없이 닥치는 이 폭풍우처럼 말이야.

segments.text: I suggest you stop talking.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 말을 그만두는 게 좋을 거야.

segments.text: People, like this branch, whose life was brutally terminated, they worked out new tools, they tried to eat the softened gold bars, and sold the food that's no longer valuable ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사람들은 이 마른 나뭇가지처럼 원래의 삶을 빼앗기고 말았어. 새로운 주방 기구를 개발하고, 연화된 골드바를 억지로 삼켰으며, 값어치 없는 먹거리를 팔게 되었지...

segments.text: People worked so hard to understand life with their own logic ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 사람들은 자신들의 방식으로 삶을 이해해보려고 하는 거야...

segments.text: because they just want to live as much as possible, but not go back in time.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이들은 어떻게든 살아가고 싶을 뿐이지, 과거로 돌아가려는 게 아니야.

segments.text: Watch your mouth, Vertin!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 말조심해, 버틴!

segments.text: But ... going back in time ... why isn't it real life?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만... 시간을 되돌린다는 것... 왜 현실이 아닌 거지?

segments.text: Is this little rowan branch really alive, Ms. Druvis?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨, 말라비틀어진 이 작은 마가목 가지가 과연 살아있는 걸까?

segments.text: You used arcanum to keep it at the moment when it was burned.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 당신의 마도술이 마가목의 시간을 불에 타던 순간에 머무르도록 한 거야.

segments.text: Once you dispel the arcanum, it would not be what it is now. I think you are clear, Ms. Druvis, that ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마도술을 풀면 더는 이 모습이 아니게 되겠지. 드루비스 씨도 잘 알고 있을 텐데...

segments.text: Every tree lives for tomorrow.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 모든 나무의 운명은 미래를 향하고 있어.

segments.text: Enough! How abominable ... This is not where you can give your speeches and such clichés.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그만해! 정말 혐오스럽군... 여기는 네가 그런 진부한 연설이나 늘어놓을 곳이 아니야.

segments.text: Since you are still being such a bureaucrat …
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신이 아직도 그렇게 관료적으로 굴고 있으니까...

segments.text: Why not let our believers help you get used to the Manus' manners.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리 신도들이 재건의 손의 예법에 익숙해지도록 도와드리는 게 어떨까요.

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Ugh ...! How dare you!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 으악...! 감히 어떻게...!

segments.text: The vase shatters into pieces during the chaos.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 혼란 속에서 꽃병이 산산조각이 난다.

segments.text: The deadwood falls out, and surprisingly shows a touch of green as if the incantation has been dispelled.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 마른 나뭇가지가 떨어져 나가더니, 놀랍게도 마치 마법이 풀린 것처럼 푸른빛이 살짝 드러나는군.

segments.text: You should not touch other's belongings. Look what you've done!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 남의 물건에 함부로 손대면 안 돼. 봐, 이게 다 네가 한 짓이야!

segments.text: I heard that ... rowan was often planted next to the Welsh cemeteries, because it would guide the deceased to the next life, so as not to stay in the world and haunt the living.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 웨일스의 묘지 근처에는... 마가목을 자주 심었다고 들었어. 죽은 자들을 내세로 인도해서 이승에 머물며 산 자들을 괴롭히지 않도록 하기 위해서였지.

segments.text: But I was hoping ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 난 기대하고 있었는데...

segments.text: Never mind. The arcanum is dispelled.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 신경 쓰지 마. 마도술은 해제됐어.

segments.text: I don't like things being touched by others. Take it away.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 다른 사람이 만진 건 싫어. 치워.

segments.text: ... Alright.
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Only two are left at the large dining table.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 커다란 식탁 옆에 두 사람의 형체만 보인다.

segments.text: That branch, you've treasured it for a long time. Is it alright to just give that to her?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그 가지, 오랫동안 소중히 간직해왔잖아. 그냥 그 애한테 줘도 괜찮은 거야?

segments.text: You asked me to stay. Is there anything you would like me to know?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 저를 머물게 하셨군요. 제가 알아야 할 일이 있으신가요?

segments.text: ... Yes. I've received an instruction from the Guiding One.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: ... 네. 인도자님으로부터 지시를 받았습니다.

segments.text: Our next plan concerns you.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 다음 계획은 너와 관련이 있어.

segments.text: Follow me.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 따라와.

segments.text: It's a nice view here.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 여기 경치가 좋네.

segments.text: Indeed. Where your woods can just be seen.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 맞아. 네 숲이 보이는 곳 말이야.

segments.text: Are you here to ask about my decision?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내 결정에 대해 묻기 위해 온 건가?

segments.text: We have negotiated with the local government. They are very interested in your woods.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 지방 정부와 협상했어. 그들이 당신의 숲에 상당한 관심을 보이고 있어.

segments.text: Because of the "Storm", the medical supplies cannot meet the needs of the surging number of patients.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우 때문에 의료용품이 급증하는 환자 수요를 감당할 수 없어.

segments.text: They need places to house the patients and refugees.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 환자들과 난민들을 수용할 장소가 필요해.

segments.text: Your woods ... are the best choice, for its abundant space and adaptability to cast the healing rituals.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신의 숲은... 치유 의식을 행하기에 충분한 공간과 적응성을 갖추고 있어서 최고의 선택이에요.

segments.text: So, have you made up your mind, Miss Druvis?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그래서, 마음을 정했나요, 드루비스 양?

segments.text: You are always welcome to join us Manus.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 마누스, 언제든지 우리와 함께해도 좋아.

segments.text: If I join you, will you reject the government because of me?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내가 합류하면, 나 때문에 정부와 등지게 될 텐데 괜찮아?

segments.text: We have a better plan.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리에게 더 좋은 계획이 있어.

segments.text: In the woods, they are going to build the only major relief shelter in the city. Arcanum will be used as the main treatment here, which means …
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 숲에서 시내 유일의 대규모 구호소를 건설할 예정이야. 여기서는 마도술을 주요 치료법으로 사용할 건데, 그 말은...

segments.text: Food.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 음식.

segments.text: Resource.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 자원.

segments.text: Money.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 돈.

segments.text: And everything necessary to build Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그리고 재건의 손을 세우는 데 필요한 모든 것들을 말이야.

segments.text: We've reached a consensus. Nobody can offer a better assistance in the field of arcanum than us.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리끼리 합의를 봤어. 마도술 분야에서 우리보다 더 나은 도움을 줄 수 있는 사람은 없거든.

segments.text: ... What about those refugees?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 그 난민들은 어떻게 되는 거야?

segments.text: Only those who are sifted out by the "Storm" will become refugees.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우에 의해 걸러진 자들만이 난민이 될 것이다.

segments.text: You will not. You have my word.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그러지 않을 거야. 내가 약속하지.

segments.text: We hope that on the "Relief Day",  you'll show up as the owner of the woods, and offer your help.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 구호의 날에는 숲의 주인으로서 나타나 도움을 주시길 바랍니다.

segments.text: I am no longer the owner of the woods ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나는 더 이상 숲의 주인이 아니야...

segments.text: For as long as you need, I will transfer the ownership to you at anytime. Not to mention that the one and only owner of the woods is you, from the beginning to the end.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신이 필요한 한, 언제든지 소유권을 당신에게 넘겨드릴게요. 게다가 이 숲의 유일한 주인은 처음부터 끝까지 당신이니까요.

segments.text: I know how you feel. What you once had ... is what I should have.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 네 기분을 알겠어. 네가 한때 가졌던 것... 그게 내가 가져야 했던 거야.

segments.text: I will look after the woods for you, till the moment we start the "Relief Day" plan.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: Relief Day" 계획을 시작하는 그 순간까지, 제가 숲을 지켜드리겠습니다.

segments.text: Thank you.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 고마워.

segments.text: Forget Me Not has been away for a long time.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 물망초가 오랫동안 떠나 있었어.

segments.text: She looks out of the window.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그녀는 창밖을 내다본다.

segments.text: Those trees ... shall sprout?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 저 나무들이... 싹을 틔울까?

segments.text: For tomorrow ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내일을 위해서...

segments.text: 5 HOURS AGO
segments.translation: 5시간 전

segments.text: Endless vines.
segments.translation: 끝이 보이지 않는 덩굴들.

segments.text: Restless slimes.
segments.translation: 불안한 슬라임들이다.

segments.text: The enemies are approaching.
segments.translation: 적들이 접근하고 있다.

segments.text: And there is no way out.
segments.translation: 그리고 출구는 없다.

segments.text: F**k! Not enough bullets. Cover me, my lord!
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 젠장! 총알이 부족해. 엄호해 줘!

segments.text: Your wound hasn't healed. Can't get hurt anymore. Stay behind me!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아직 상처도 아물지 않았잖아. 더 이상 다치면 안 돼, 얼른 내 뒤로 와!

segments.text: This is a cage. She wants to catch us! The exit at two is our last chance! Breakthrough!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 새장은... 우릴 잡아두려는 거야! 두 시 방향에 마지막 출구가 보여! 나갈 수 있는 마지막 기회야!

segments.text: No, my lord ... it's too late ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아니에요... 너무 늦었어요...

segments.text: Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: It hurts ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: The slime on the thorns will make your body stiff. Be careful!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가시덤불의 점액에 닿으면 몸이 굳어버려, 조심해...!!

segments.text: All retreats are blocked. We are caught.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 모든 퇴로가 막혔어. 우리는 포위됐다.

segments.text: ... No. We can't be trapped here. Let me try again!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...아니야. 이대로 갇힐 수는 없어, 내가 다시 해볼게!

segments.text: Give it up.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 포기해.

segments.text: Flamo Flicker!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 반짝이는 불꽃...!

segments.text: Ugh!! ... It bounced back ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 윽!!... 튕겨 나오다니...

segments.text: How? How is the thorn cage so tough?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어째서지? 가시덤불로 만든 새장이 이렇게 질기다고...?!

segments.text: It's over.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 끝났어.

segments.text: Aferoj Away!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아페로이 어웨이!

segments.text: Umm ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: Damn it! Why!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 젠장! 대체 왜!

segments.text: You are not pure blood, right? ... My lord.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 당신은 순혈이 아니군요? ... 주인님.

segments.text: ... I'm not sure.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 나도 잘 모르겠어.

segments.text: Heh heh, you are like me—crappy guys not good at arcanum.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤, 너도 나랑 똑같네—마도술에 젬병인 찌질이 말이야.

segments.text: Don't you see it? The pure-blood arcanists and we ... are worlds apart.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 보이지 않아? 순혈 마도사들과 우리는... 하늘과 땅 차이야.

segments.text: We can't beat Druvis. You know it. When you push out the old woman in white, you should have figured it out.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우리는 드루비스를 이길 수 없어. 너도 알고 있잖아. 흰옷을 입은 그 할머니를 밀어냈을 때, 이미 깨달았어야 했는데.

segments.text: No matter how we struggle, it makes no difference. We will be sent to Arcana.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아무리 발버둥쳐도 소용없어. 우린 결국 아르카나로 보내질 거야.

segments.text: ... There must be a way. It just takes time.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 분명 방법은 있어, 단지 시간이 좀 필요할 뿐이야.

segments.text: You are braver than most people I've ever met, my lord. But it's not enough.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 당신은 제가 만난 사람들 중 누구보다 용감하군요. 하지만 그것만으론 부족해요.

segments.text: Far from enough ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아직 턱없이 부족해...

segments.text: When it's time, please kill me.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 때가 되면, 날 죽여줘.

segments.text: What are you talking about?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 무슨 말을 하는 거야?!

segments.text: Left of my chest.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 내 가슴 왼쪽.

segments.text: The Manus will not let us go. Killing each other ... has always been their favourite.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 재건의 손은 우리를 그냥 놔두지 않을 거야. 서로 죽이고 죽는 것... 그게 항상 그들이 가장 좋아하는 일이거든.

segments.text: You are much more important than me, my lord. Cherish your value.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 당신이 저보다 훨씬 중요한 분이에요. 자신의 가치를 소중히 여기세요.

segments.text: ... I don't understand ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...이해할 수 없어...

segments.text: Remember. Left of my chest. Do it quick.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 기억해. 내 가슴 왼쪽이야. 빨리 해.

segments.text: It's too risky, and ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 너무 무모한 계획이야. 게다가...

segments.text: If you want to survive ... we have no choice. Trust me, my lord. I cherish my life more than anyone ... ahem ahem ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 살아남고 싶다면... 선택의 여지가 없어. 날 믿어, 주인님. 누구보다 내 목숨이 소중하거든... 콜록 콜록...

segments.text: But what you said ... She ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 방금 말한 건... 그녀가...

segments.text: She heard it all.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그녀가 전부 들어버렸어.

segments.text: Heh, heh, you are right, my lord.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤, 맞습니다.

segments.text: Our destiny ... is her choice.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우리의 운명은... 그녀의 선택이야.

segments.text: The second, the first, and underground—altogether three secret chambers in the speakeasy. There are mainly material rooms, study rooms, and corridor on the second floor. Cross out.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 2층, 1층, 그리고 지하까지—은밀한 술집에 총 세 개의 비밀 방이 있어. 2층에는 주로 자료실, 서재, 복도가 있고. 제외.

segments.text: The most likely place to park Schneider ... should be in one of the rooms on the other two floors.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더를 가둬둘 가능성이 높은 곳은... 나머지 2개 층 중 하나일 거야.

segments.text: It's a pity that the patrolmen could not be confirmed. I'm afraid a battle will be inevitable.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아쉽지만 경비의 위치는 확인하지 못했어, 힘겨운 싸움이 되겠네.

segments.text: Bring the healing potion, other potions, medical equipment, food, masks of the Manus, and ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 치료 포션과 다른 포션들, 의료 장비, 식량, 마누스의 가면, 그리고...

segments.text: The rowan branch sprouted. The symbol of protection and blessing ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마가목 가지에 벌써 싹이 돋았네. 가호와 축복을 상징하는 나무지...

segments.text: I'll take it. Go.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이것도 가져가야지. 출발하자.

segments.text: Follow the map, avoid the minions and search the rooms.
segments.translation: 지도를 따라 추종자들을 피해 방을 수색했다.

segments.text: The Manus's mask blocks their sight. It both shelters and blinds them.
segments.translation: 재건의 가면이 그들의 시야를 차단한다. 가면은 그들을 보호하는 동시에 눈을 멀게 한다.

segments.text: There are no obstacles from the followers and disciples along the way, since a salute will save all the troubles. The tunnel to the underground floor is right ahead.
segments.translation: 길을 따라 오는 추종자들과 제자들의 방해는 없었다. 경례 한 번이면 모든 번거로움을 피할 수 있기 때문이다. 지하층으로 향하는 터널이 바로 앞에 있다.

segments.text: It is a fork in the road.
segments.translation: 갈림길이 나타났다.

segments.text: It's weird. It was a straight path when investigating.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이상하다. 아까 돌아볼 때만 해도 분명 길은 하나뿐이었는데.

segments.text: Hm? Someone's coming. I should hide from them.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 응? 누가 이쪽으로 오고 있어. 어서 피해야 해.

segments.text: Why ...? The rowan branch seems to be pulling me? Does it want me to choose the path where they are?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 왠지... 마가목 가지가 날 잡아당기는 것 같은데? 그러니까... 사람들이 있는 이쪽 길로 가라는 건가?

segments.text: OK, then I'll wait for them to go over.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아, 그럼 그들이 지나갈 때까지 기다리자.

segments.text: I saw my grandma in the entrance of the hospital. She choked on cash, and was carried on a stretcher ... She can't even recognize me.
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅰ
segments.translation: 병원 입구에서 할머니를 봤어. 할머니는 돈에 목이 막혀서 들것에 실려갔어... 할머니는 나를 알아보지도 못해.

segments.text: It's nothing, Mr. Thomas. My son Robert's dead. I heard it on the radio.
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 괜찮습니다, 토마스 씨. 제 아들 로버트가 죽었어요. 라디오에서 들었습니다.

segments.text: They are just sifted out by the "Storm," not as lucky as we are.
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 그들은 그냥 폭풍우에 걸러진 거야. 우리만큼 운이 좋지 않았던 거지.

segments.text: I don't understand ... 3 hours before you were still ... crying ...
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅰ
segments.translation: 이해가 안 돼... 3시간 전까지만 해도 넌 아직... 울고 있었는데...

segments.text: We have to accept all this, accept that the dream of our new age is broken ...
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 우리는 이 모든 것을 받아들여야 해, 우리의 새로운 시대라는 꿈이 산산조각 났다는 것을...

segments.text: and the fact that we have to fight against the government tomorrow.
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 그리고 내일 정부와 싸워야 한다는 사실 말이야.

segments.text: Fight against the government?!
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅰ
segments.translation: 정부에 맞서 싸운다고?!

segments.text: Yes. Mr. Forget Me Not told me so. We need to deliver tons of goods to the real "Sanctuary" of Manus Vindictae.
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 네. 물망초 씨가 그렇게 말씀하셨어요. 재건의 손의 진짜 성역에 엄청난 양의 물품들을 배송해야 한다고요.

segments.text: Our safety is not fully guaranteed even with the masks.  Only in the "Sanctuary" can we hide from the influence of the "Storm" ...
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 마스크를 착용해도 우리의 안전이 완전히 보장되는 건 아니야. 오직 성역에서만 폭풍우의 영향으로부터 숨을 수 있어...

segments.text: And then, we set sail anew to the new age, to the new life!!! Just like Miss Vertin, our
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅱ
segments.translation: 그리고 우리는 새로운 시대로, 새로운 삶을 향해 다시 항해를 시작한다!!! 버틴 씨처럼, 우리의

segments.text: What are you talking about? Mr. Robert, y-y-your hand, what the black slime?
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅰ
segments.translation: 무슨 소리예요? 로버트 씨, 그-그 손은 뭐예요, 그 검은 끈적한 게?

segments.text: Wha-wha-what's this! You're like one of those monsters?! Huh! I'll go to find somebody ...
segments.speaker: The Manus Follower Ⅰ
segments.translation: 뭐-뭐-뭐야 이거! 너도 그 괴물들 중 하나야?! 헉! 누군가 찾으러 가야겠어...

segments.text: Both his appearance and voice have changed, just like the believers who can't talk ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 겉모습이랑 목소리 전부 다 변해버리다니... 말하지 못하는 신도들이랑 똑같아...

segments.text: Is it because of the mask? Or Arcana?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 가면 때문인가? 아니면 아르카나의 능력 때문인가?

segments.text: No, I can't stay any longer. I need to pass through here and go to the underground before anyone else comes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아니야, 더 이상 여기 있을 수 없어. 다른 누군가가 오기 전에 여기를 지나서 지하로 가야 해.

segments.text: "Mine hands, thine order." I am Vertin, a follower like you. Please let me pass.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내 손으로 질서를 바로잡으리라." 나는 당신과 같은 재건의 추종자인 버틴이다. 잠시 길 좀 터줄 수 있나.

segments.text: He can't be talked into sense ... Is he moving just by instinct?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이미 의사소통이 불가능한 상태군... 직감과 본능에 따라 움직이는 건가?

segments.text: I can only stun you first! Sorry ... Mr. Robert.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그럼 먼저 공격하는 수밖에! 미안해... 로버트 씨.

segments.text: Footsteps. At least five or six people. I should go downstairs quickly.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 발소리가 들리는군, 최소 다섯, 여섯 명은 되겠어. 어서 내려가자.

segments.text: The underground ... another turnoff!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지하 1층... 또 갈림길이잖아!

segments.text: The sprout is growing at an unbelievable speed. It seems to be leading the way.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 새싹이 믿을 수 없는 속도로 자라고 있어. 길을 안내하고 있는 것 같아.

segments.text: Are you really showing me the way? Then ... I'll go left.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 정말 나를 이끌고 있는 건가? 그럼... 왼쪽으로 가지 뭐.

segments.text: So close. Just avoided another group of guards ... It's a wine room. Schneider is not here. Next ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 큰일 날 뻔했네, 경비들을 따돌렸어. 여긴 주류 창고인가, 슈나이더는 안 보이는군. 다음은...

segments.text: This is ... a floating staircase going down?! Is there another fourth space?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이건... 아래로 통하는 공중 계단?! 설마 4번째 층이 있는 건가?

segments.text: The sprout is already of a finger's length. There is even a small bud on it. It points downstairs.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 새싹은 손가락 길이만큼 자랐다. 게다가 꽃봉오리도 자라났으며, 아래쪽을 가리키고 있었다.

segments.text: Fine. Last bet. I'll go down.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋아, 마지막 도박이야. 내려가자.

segments.text: I found you ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드디어 찾았어...

segments.text: Schneider!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더!

segments.text: She is barely breathing.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그녀는 거의 숨을 쉬지 못하고 있어.

segments.text: Black bloodstains and feathers congeal into a silent figure.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 커다란 검은 혈흔들은 깃털에 엉겨 붙어 침묵의 덩어리를 이루었다.

segments.text: Weak pulse ... How come? We should have time for first aid …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맥박이 희미해... 이럴 수가, 분명 응급처치 시간이 지나지 않았을 텐데...

segments.text: My lord ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 주인님...

segments.text: Did I see illusions? ... Or are you missing me ... just as I'm missing you? ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 환상을 본 걸까? ... 아니면 너도 나를... 내가 너를 그리워하는 것처럼... 그리워하고 있는 건가? ...

segments.text: Holding me ... so tight ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 날... 이렇게 꽉 안고...

segments.text: Thank goodness you're fine. Drink these.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다행이야, 이제 괜찮아. 얼른 이걸 마셔.

segments.text: Umm uggh ... Too rough, my lord! We just met ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 으음 으윽... 너무 거칠어요, 주인님! 우리 방금 만났는데...

segments.text: Umm ... Is it the special healing potion?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 음... 특별한 치료 물약인가요?

segments.text: And this. Eat. You must have been hungry for so long.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 이것도 먹어. 배 많이 고팠지?

segments.text: ... What's this, my lord?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: ... 이게 뭐죠?

segments.text: It's the leftover cake from dinner. I can't bring too much with me. Hang in for a while. They will send you out here tonight.
segments.speaker: Vertin
