segments.translation: 저녁에 남은 케이크야. 너무 많이는 가져갈 수 없어서. 조금만 더 버텨. 오늘 밤에 널 여기서 내보내 줄 거야.

segments.text: I just don't know ... How did you do that? When you bumped me ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 잘 모르겠어... 어떻게 한 거야? 네가 날 부딪쳤을 때...

segments.text: The bullet did hit your chest.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 총알이 분명 가슴에 박혔는데.

segments.text: I don't have much energy to talk, my lord ... I just want to know ... Druvis's last choice.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 말할 기력도 별로 없어... 그냥... 드루비스의 마지막 선택이 뭐였는지 알고 싶을 뿐이야.

segments.text: I didn't have the chance to talk to her alone. But I think, since I can meet you now, maybe ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 단둘이 얘기할 기회가 없었어. 하지만 이렇게 널 만날 수 있게 된 걸 보아하니 아마도...

segments.text: Ahh. It's blooming.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아아. 피어나고 있네.

segments.text: tmr 10am. Heavy fog. Relief Shelter in the woods.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내일 아침 10시, 짙은 안개, 숲속 중앙 치료센터에서.

segments.text: Maybe she shares the same dream with us.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아마 우리랑 같은 꿈을 꾸고 있을지도 몰라.

segments.text: Schneider. Now you need to save your strength.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더, 이제부터 체력을 아껴둬야 해.

segments.text: Don't open your eyes until you meet Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트를 만나기 전까지는 눈 뜨지 마.

segments.text: I'll see you in the Relief Shelter.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 치료센터에서 만나자.

segments.text: Okay, it's time to publish the lab results of the 42nd trial of The Chew-Chew Hallucinogen III!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 좋아, 이제 츄츄 환각제 III의 42번째 실험 결과를 발표할 시간이야!

segments.text: Tell me about what you saw?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 무엇을 봤는지 말해줄래?

segments.text: The Madonna, dagger, Portland cement blocks ...  ahh yuck! It tastes like cement too.
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 성모상, 단검, 포틀랜드 시멘트 블록... 아, 역겨! 맛도 시멘트 같네.

segments.text: Wool, twine and scissors, pineapple cherry tomato pizza ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 양털, 실, 가위, 파인애플 방울토마토 피자...

segments.text: Oh no no no no. How sacrilegious ... my Lord!
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 아, 안 돼 안 돼 안 돼 안 돼. 이렇게 신성모독을... 주인님!

segments.text: Glenn Miller's trombone collection, medals ... and ...
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 글렌 밀러의 트롬본 컬렉션, 메달들... 그리고...

segments.text: Why is that here—the body of my dog in the trench?
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 왜 저게 여기 있는 거지... 참호에 있는 내 개의 시체가?

segments.text: ... Gosh! Really sorry, Mr. Karson ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: ... 어머! 정말 죄송해요, 카슨 씨...

segments.text: Still need to improve, improve! It's alright. Give me more time. Thirty minutes are enough!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아직 개선이 필요해, 개선이! 괜찮아. 시간을 좀 더 줘. 30분이면 충분해!

segments.text: Turns out the "Storm Syndrome" can distort all the senses about foods ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 폭풍우 증후군이 음식과 관련된 모든 지각을 왜곡시킬 줄이야...

segments.text: Working up an appetite with hallucinogen is harder than I thought. Miss Sotheby, we have to hurry up.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 환각제로 식욕을 돋우는 게 생각보다 어렵네요. 소더비 씨, 서둘러야 해요.

segments.text: The longer they can't eat, the weaker they get.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 오랫동안 음식을 먹지 못해서 사람들의 체력이 약해지고 있어요.

segments.text: I know. I will make it ... I've learnt so many formulas ... and bought so many of the best ingredients ... I ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 알아요. 제가 해낼 거예요... 공식도 정말 많이 배웠고... 최고급 재료들도 많이 샀어요... 저는...

segments.text: Hey! Stop it, Anna! Don't eat these banknotes! Stop her, Ms. Sonetto!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어! 그만해, 안나! 그 지폐들 먹으면 안 돼! 소네트 씨, 안나 좀 말려주세요!

segments.text: Stono Swift!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 스토노 스위프트!

segments.text: Sorry. For the humans who have temporarily lost their minds, this is the only way to go.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 죄송해요. 일시적으로 정신을 잃은 사람들에게는 이 방법밖에 없어요.

segments.text: I received the message from the patrol team. Followers are around the manor.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 순찰팀한테 연락이 왔어요. 장원 주변에 추종자들이 나타났다는군요.

segments.text: What?! They must be doing something bad! Stop them. Don't let them in!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 뭐?! 분명 나쁜 짓을 하려는 거야! 막아야 해. 들어오지 못하게 해!

segments.text: The rolling wind is not usual tonight.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 오늘 밤 바람이 평소와 달라.

segments.text: Miss Sonetto, have you heard from the Foundation?
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 소네트 씨, 재단에서는 소식이 있었나요?

segments.text: Not yet ... If the instructions are delayed, I am afraid I will implement the backup plan.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 아직은... 지시가 늦어지면 백업 계획을 실행할 수밖에 없을 것 같습니다.

segments.text: To rescue the Timekeeper is the primary goal.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼를 구출하는 것이 최우선 목표입니다.

segments.text: I'm afraid that reality fails you, ladies.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 유감이지만 현실은 당신들의 기대를 저버릴 거야, 아가씨들.

segments.text: Say a bunch of people carrying a stretcher.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 들것을 메고 가는 사람들이 한 무리 보인다고 해봐.

segments.text: The person on the stretcher is tightly covered with a white cloth. Only one arm with the feather decoration hangs down.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 들것 위의 사람은 하얀 천으로 꽁꽁 덮여 있다. 깃털 장식이 달린 팔 하나만이 축 늘어져 있을 뿐이다.

segments.text: Who are you!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 너 누구야!

segments.text: The masks ... You are the trouble maker, Followers? Carrying a small white bed. What's that?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 가면들... 너희가 말썽꾼들이구나, 추종자들? 작은 하얀 침대를 들고 있네. 그게 뭐야?

segments.text: That black suit ... the feathers ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 저 검은 정장... 그리고 깃털들...

segments.text: Schneider?! That's my sister Schneider! What happened ... the blood everywhere ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 슈나이더?! 내 언니 슈나이더잖아! 대체 무슨 일이... 온통 피투성이야...

segments.text: What happened? Death, of course.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 무슨 일이냐고? 당연히 죽음이지.

segments.text: There are many bodies, she is the only one to go home. Just for you to know.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 시체들은 많지만, 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 건 그녀뿐이야. 알아두라고 하는 말이야.

segments.text: It's our Ms. Vertin's decision.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 버틴 씨가 결정하실 일이에요.

segments.text: ... Nonsense!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...헛소리하지 마!

segments.text: Let me check. The scar on her chest has no sign of slime ...
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 잠시 살펴보겠습니다. 가슴의 상처를 보니 확실히 슬라임의 흔적은 없네요...

segments.text: Ms. Vertin is already one of us. We share the same blood.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 버틴 씨는 이미 우리 중 한 명이야. 같은 피를 나눈 사이니까.

segments.text: That's an incredible gunfight, greater than any you've seen last night. Believe it or not, check the scars on the body. They're like sparkling pearls on the beach.
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 어젯밤에 본 그 어떤 총격전보다도 대단했어. 믿기 어렵겠지만, 시체의 상처들을 확인해봐. 해변의 반짝이는 진주 같더라고.

segments.text: Oh … enough. Enough!!
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 아… 그만해. 그만하라고!!

segments.text: Unforgivable! How could there be someone who spoke such rude words and ... insulted the deceased and the Timekeeper like this ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 용서할 수 없어요! 어떻게 그런 무례한 말을... 고인과 타임키퍼를 이렇게 모독할 수 있단 말이에요...

segments.text: May the peace be with us.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 평화가 우리와 함께하길!

segments.text: ... The enemies are cleared.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...적은 처리했습니다.

segments.text: Good fight, old woman.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 잘 싸웠어, 할멈.

segments.text: ... Huh!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: You venge me fiercely. ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 당신이 날 위해 치열하게 복수해 주는군. ...

segments.text: Sis?! You're alive ... Thank God ... Jesus and sweet Mary!
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 언니?! 살아있었구나... 하느님 감사합니다... 예수님과 성모 마리아님!

segments.text: Huh! What is going on? How did you get these bad injuries?
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 어? 무슨 일이야? 어떻게 이렇게 심하게 다친 거야?

segments.text: Where is the Timekeeper? What happened to you? Is ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼는? 몸의 상처는 어떻게 된 거야, 설마...

segments.text: Huh emm ...
segments.speaker: Schneider

segments.text: These are not important. In your heart ... there has been an irrevocable answer for long.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그런 건 중요하지 않아. 네 마음속에는... 이미 오래전부터 돌이킬 수 없는 답이 있었잖아.

segments.text: Look at this flower. Look at every word on it ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 이 꽃을 봐. 여기 적힌 모든 글자를 봐...

segments.text: We got it at the expense of ... our lives ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우리는... 목숨을 대가로... 그걸 얻었어...

segments.text: ... I'm so glad ... I can see the starry night.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: ... 정말 다행이야... 별이 빛나는 밤하늘을 볼 수 있어서.

segments.text: She passed out! Take her inside for emergency medical attention!
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 기절했어요! 어서 안으로 옮겨서 응급처치를 해야 해요...!

segments.text: What on earth is missing ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 도대체 뭐가 없어진 거야...

segments.text: Oops!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어머!

segments.text: Please mind your step and don't forget your manners, my lady. Ms. Sonetto is at work. Do not disturb her.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 발밑을 조심하시고 예의를 지켜주시기 바랍니다, 아가씨. 소네트 양이 일하고 있으니 방해하지 마세요.

segments.text: Yes. Sonetto received. We are on our way to the Relief Shelter, close to the woods.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 네, 회신받았습니다. 저희는 현재 치료센터로 가는 중이고, 곧 숲에 도착할 예정입니다.

segments.text: Long story short. Our agents in Washington reported that all the relief supplies are being delivered to Chicago.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 요점만 말하도록 하지. 워싱턴 감시자들이 구호 물자가 모두 시카고로 운반되고 있다는 보고를 보내왔어.

segments.text: What the Manus wants are those supplies. So you need to adjust your plan.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 재건이 노리는 건 그 구호 물품이야. 자네들의 계획을 수정할 필요가 있겠어.

segments.text: Our first priority is to stop them from grabbing the supplies and to rescue the refugees.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 우선 녀석들이 물품을 약탈하지 못하게 막은 뒤 난민 인질들을 구출하도록.

segments.text: There may well be a tough battle today. Just in case, we will send you some fresh crews.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 아마 한바탕 격전이 벌어질 걸세. 혹시 모르니 자네들 무리에 합류할 새로운 멤버를 파견하도록 하지.

segments.text: Then what about the Timekeeper? She ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그럼 타임키퍼는 어떡하죠? 버틴은...

segments.text: She knows what she is doing.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 그녀는 스스로의 할 일을 잘 알고 있을 거야.

segments.text: You will meet when the mission is completed,  Sonetto.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 임무가 완료되면 만나게 될 거야, 소네트.

segments.text: ... Understood. I will do my best.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...알겠습니다. 노력해보겠습니다.

segments.text: Thank you for what you have done for the well-being of mankind. Looking forward to the good news.
segments.speaker: Z
segments.translation: 인류 복지를 위한 자네들의 공로에 감사를 표하지. 그럼 좋은 소식을 기다리고 있겠네.

segments.text: An arrow dripping with slime pierces the letter.
segments.speaker: THe letter from the Foundation
segments.translation: 끈적한 점액이 뚝뚝 떨어지는 화살이 편지를 꿰뚫는다.

segments.text: Woods are locked! Go back if you're not transport staff!
segments.speaker: Follower
segments.translation: 숲은 봉쇄됐어! 운송 직원이 아니라면 돌아가!

segments.text: Of course we are the transport staff, though the direction we're going is different from yours.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 물론 저희도 수송 담당이죠. 다만 저희가 가는 방향은 당신들과 다르지만요.

segments.text: Hmm? Now they arrived. I feel a lot more awake!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 음? 이제 도착했네. 훨씬 정신이 드는걸!

segments.text: Everyone, please lend me your strength.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여러분, 저를 지원해 주세요!

segments.text: Although only half a day has passed, the woods are no longer the same as it was.
segments.translation: 겨우 반나절 사이에 숲은 전과 확연히 달라져 있었다.

segments.text: People sit around the base camp tent, stretchers, and temporary stoves, trying to smile in a pale face.
segments.translation: 사람들은 군용 천막, 간이침대, 임시 부엌에 둘러앉은 채 창백한 얼굴로 애써 미소 짓고 있었다.

segments.text: In the center, next to the huge crucible, there is a high wooden platform as required for a press conference with a Steinway piano.
segments.translation: 중앙에는 거대한 도가니 옆에 기자회견용 높은 나무 플랫폼이 있고, 그 위에는 스타인웨이 피아노가 놓여 있다.

segments.text: Hmm let me see, umm Mr. Forget Me Not. So you are the man who's gonna work with us?
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 음, 어디 보자... 어... 물망초 씨. 그러니까 당신이 저희와 함께 일하게 될 분이신가요?

segments.text: Exactly.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 맞아.

segments.text: Show me your physician's license. Are you good at clinical diagnosis? How many patients have you seen?
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 의사 면허증을 보여주세요. 임상 진단을 잘하시나요? 환자는 몇 명이나 봤습니까?

segments.text: Sir, I'm an arcanist.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 선생님, 저는 마도사입니다.

segments.text: Oh, A.K.A con artist, right?
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 아, 그러니까 사기꾼 말이지?

segments.text: I was invited. You've already prepared the crucible and materials I need, why bother asking me?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 초대받았으니까. 필요한 도가니와 재료도 이미 준비해놨으면서, 굳이 왜 묻는 거야?

segments.text: ... What can this freak do? Playing house with some rotten roots and toad?
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: ... 저 괴물이 뭘 할 수 있다고? 썩은 뿌리나 두꺼비랑 소꿉장난이나 하면서?

segments.text: Isn't this Mr. Forget Me Not! Fabulous, such a relief that you're here ...
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 이런, 포겟 미 낫 씨가 아니신가요! 정말 다행이에요, 당신이 여기 계셔서 얼마나 안심이 되는지...

segments.text: We haven't had any food for a whole night. We're starving, and can't stop thinking about eating ... I don't know. They say it's cash.
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 밤새도록 아무것도 먹지 못했어요. 배가 고파서 먹을 것 생각밖에 안 나네요... 잘 모르겠지만, 사람들은 그게 돈이라고 하더군요.

segments.text: Don't worry, I promise everything will be ok, Mrs. Durant.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마세요, 듀란트 부인. 모든 게 괜찮아질 거라고 약속드릴게요.

segments.text: For the love of all the great party times we had! We couldn't take any more of these.
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 우리가 함께했던 그 모든 즐거운 시간들을 생각해서라도! 이런 일들은 더 이상 견딜 수가 없어!

segments.text: So ... there are other zones here.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그러니까... 여기에도 다른 구역들이 있다는 거군.

segments.text: Then ... who is living outside the white tent zone?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그럼... 흰 천막 구역 밖에는 누가 살고 있는 거야?

segments.text: Only god knows. I heard that it's a bunch tramps and vendors, I've never seen them before!
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 신만이 알겠지. 떠돌이들과 행상인들 무리라고 들었는데, 본 적은 없어!

segments.text: However, distinguished lady, you look very familiar. Have we met somewhere before?
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 하지만 귀부인, 어디선가 뵌 것 같은데요. 혹시 전에 만난 적이 있나요?

segments.text: I am afraid you made a mistake, madam.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 죄송하지만 착각하신 것 같습니다, 부인.

segments.text: The military officer gets angry as more and more people gather around here.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 여기에 사람들이 점점 더 모여들자 군 장교가 화를 내고 있어.

segments.text: Stop dawdling! Since you're here to save lives, hurry up then! Thousands of people are waiting!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 꾸물거리지 마! 생명을 구하러 온 거라면 서둘러! 수천 명의 사람들이 기다리고 있다고!

segments.text: Keep silent when I'm making potions, sir.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 물약을 만들 때는 조용히 해주세요.

segments.text: Yeah, pretentious ...
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 그래, 가식적이야...

segments.text: I'll check 30 mins later, to see what the hell you're up to!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corps Officer
segments.translation: 30분 후에 확인해서 네가 도대체 뭘 하고 있는지 봐야겠어!

segments.text: I'm not interested in fruit cuts before the meal.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 식사 전 과일 안주 따위엔 관심 없어.

segments.text: You're surprised? He is just another stupid human.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 놀랐어? 그냥 또 다른 멍청한 인간일 뿐이야.

segments.text: Enjoy the peace before "the Storm".
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 폭풍우가 오기 전의 평화를 만끽해.

segments.text: These powders are not poisonous.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이 가루약들은 독성이 없어.

segments.text: Also the potion he's brewing doesn't do any obvious harm.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그가 끓이고 있는 포션도 딱히 해로워 보이지 않아.

segments.text: This smells nice. Even like ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 좋은 냄새가 나는데. 마치...

segments.text: Why? Does he really want to treat the patients? Impossible.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 어째서지? 진짜 병을 고칠 생각인가? 그럴 리가.

segments.text: Move! Get outta my way!
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 비켜! 길에서 꺼져!

segments.text: Where did they hide the medicine? Tear it,
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 약을 어디에 숨겨뒀지? 찢어버려,

segments.text: Cotton ... cotton ... Ah! It's the quilt! Who wants this s**t!
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 솜... 솜... 아! 이불이구나! 누가 이딴 걸 원한다고!

segments.text: Relief supplies?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 구호 물품?!

segments.text: So that's it ... Lots of reserved food and oil, medical supplies, emergency supplies, and temporary infrastructure tools …
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그렇구나... 비축된 식량과 기름, 의료용품, 비상용품, 그리고 임시 인프라 도구들까지...

segments.text: Without official support, Manus Vindictae needs supplies to gain a foothold in different eras.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 손은 정부의 지원을 받지 않으니, 다른 시대에서 입지를 확보하려면 물자가 필요한 걸 거야.

segments.text: The so-called peace before the "Storm" is to cover up the transport of supplies!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우 전야의 고요함이라는 건 물자를 빼돌리는 걸 덮기 위해서였군!

segments.text: No. Ten is too late. I must meet Sonetto before that!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 되겠어. 10시까지 기다릴 때가 아니야, 반드시 그 전에 소네트와 만나야 해!

segments.text: Hey! You wanna steal the potion? Gimme the potion!
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 야! 물약 훔치려고? 물약 내놔!

segments.text: It's a misunderstanding. I don't have the potion. It will be delivered very soon.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 오해입니다. 전 여기서 일하는 사람이 아니에요. 다만 포션은 곧 올 겁니다.

segments.text: Can't be talked into senses, the tramp utters a cry.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 노숙자는 처량하게 울부짖었다.

segments.text: No! You can't fool me ...! You're afraid of me ... you're afraid of getting burned! ... Gimme that ...!
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 안 돼! 날 속일 수는 없어...! 넌 나를 무서워하고 있어... 화상을 입을까 봐 두려워하고 있다고...! 그거 내놓으라고...!

segments.text: Crap. Other people will be attracted here! I need to take him down ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 큰일이다, 이러다 다른 사람들까지 이쪽으로 몰려들겠어! 얼른 무슨 수를 써야 해...!

segments.text: ... Sorry. Take a rest. You can no longer waste your energy like this.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...미안해요. 잠시 눈 좀 붙이세요. 이런 식으로 체력을 소모하시면 안 됩니다.

segments.text: An unguarded trail hides behind the bushes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 관목숲 뒤로 경비가 없는 오솔길이 숨어 있다.

segments.text: A smell of stale, burnt gasoline lingers.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 오래된 휘발유 타는 냄새가 맴돈다.

segments.text: Are you running away?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 도망치는 거야?

segments.text: Ms. Druvis ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨...

segments.text: No. I'm picking them up.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아니야. 내가 데리러 가는 거야.

segments.text: Then you should not pick this way. Are you still as lost as you were at the beginning?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그렇다면 이 길을 선택하지 말았어야지. 너는 아직도 처음처럼 길을 잃은 상태인 거야?

segments.text: It is heavily guarded in the front. There are more serious crises than just now.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 앞쪽은 경비가 삼엄해. 방금보다 더 심각한 위기들이 있어.

segments.text: Even so, are you still moving forward?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그래도 여전히 앞으로 나아갈 건가?

segments.text: ... Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...물론이죠.

segments.text: Until we see "tomorrow" with our own eyes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 내일을 직접 확인할 수 있을 때까지.

segments.text: Will you come with me, Druvis?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨, 저랑 같이 가시겠습니까?

segments.text: Your friends are on the way.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 네 친구들이 오고 있어.

segments.text: I "see" ... the huge engines are roaring towards here.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 보이는군"... 거대한 엔진들이 이쪽으로 굉음을 내며 다가오고 있어.

segments.text: What "we" desire is being removed; what "we" despise is being rescued.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 우리가 바라는 것은 사라지고 있고, 우리가 혐오하는 것은 구원받고 있어.

segments.text: But "our" enemies are still increasing. From north to south. From east to west.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 우리의 적들은 여전히 늘어나고 있어. 북쪽에서 남쪽까지. 동쪽에서 서쪽까지.

segments.text: The "Storm" is coming.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 오고 있어.

segments.text: I accept your invitation.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 초대를 받아들이겠습니다.

segments.text: But this is a formal farewell. I need to see my woods one last time and engrave it in my mind.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 이건 정식 작별이야. 내 숲을 마지막으로 한 번 더 보고 마음속에 새겨둬야 해.

segments.text: She fiddles with her hair, walking towards the shelter.
segments.translation: 그녀는 머리를 쓸어올리더니 치료센터 방향으로 걸어갔다.

segments.text: Good? This should be the third transport truck we seized.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어때요? 이게 아마 우리가 포획한 세 번째 운송 트럭이죠?

segments.text: In order to avoid attention, the Manus reduced the number of guards for the supply transport. They must have never expected our attack.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 주의를 끌지 않기 위해 재건의 손이 보급 수송대의 경비를 줄였군요. 우리의 공격은 전혀 예상하지 못했을 거예요.

segments.text: Captain, lead the team to escort the three vehicles back to the manor.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 부대장, 지금 팀원들과 함께 이 수송차 세 대를 장원으로 호송하세요.

segments.text: You and the others, follow me to the Relief Shelter.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 여러분은 저와 함께 구호소로 향해 주세요.

segments.text: Copy that!
segments.speaker: Team members
segments.translation: 알겠습니다!

segments.text: Have you made the latest hallucinogen, my lady? If you are confident, you can pour it into my mouth ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 최신 환각제를 만드셨나요, 아가씨? 자신이 있으시다면 제 입에 부어주셔도...

segments.text: Thank you for being my experimental subject!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 실험 대상이 되어 줘서 고마워!

segments.text: But even if it's successful, you won't have any reaction.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 하지만 성공한다고 해도, 너는 아무 반응도 보이지 않을 거야.

segments.text: You don't want to eat gold bars ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 금괴는 먹는 게 아니야...

segments.text: Humph? Is someone questioning my contribution?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 흥? 누가 내 공헌도에 의문을 제기하는 거야?

segments.text: I am willing to try it for my family first ... Isn't that okay? My lady is really hard to understand.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우선 가족을 위해서라면 해볼 의향이 있어... 괜찮지 않나? 우리 아가씨는 정말 이해하기 어려워.

segments.text: After all, I am the woman who escaped from Druvis III. ... Compared to any of you ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 어쨌든 난 드루비스 III에서 탈출한 여자야. ... 너희들 중 누구와 비교해도 ...

segments.text: I know what death ... tastes like ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 죽음이... 어떤 맛인지 알아...

segments.text: Ms. Druvis, who's that? You mention her a lot. Is it only me who does not know her?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨, 그분이 누구예요? 자주 언급하시는데. 저만 모르는 건가요?

segments.text: I have read her investigation report. She is the stepdaughter of Washington State Forestry Tycoon.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 조사 보고서를 읽어봤는데, 그녀는 워싱턴주 임업 재벌의 의붓딸이에요.

segments.text: You mean the Weyerhaeuser? Master once dealt with them.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 와이어하우저 말씀이신가요? 주인님께서 예전에 그들과 거래하신 적이 있습니다.

segments.text: However, the family suffered a great deal of misfortune. It was even in The Times.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 하지만 그 가문은 큰 불행을 겪었지. 타임스지에도 실렸을 정도였어.

segments.text: The Soviet Union artificially lowered wood prices and that led to their bankruptcy. Fate can't be resisted.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 소비에트 연방이 인위적으로 목재 가격을 낮춰서 파산에 이르게 된 거야. 운명은 거스를 수 없는 법이지.

segments.text: Let alone ... no, never mind.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 하물며... 아니, 됐어.

segments.text: Why did you hesitate, Mr. Karson?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 왜 망설이셨나요, 카슨 씨?

segments.text: Nothing, I assume that Ms. Druvis will prefer not to bring up such an old story again.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 아무것도 아닙니다. 드루비스 씨께서는 그런 오래된 이야기를 다시 꺼내고 싶어 하지 않으실 거라고 생각합니다.

segments.text: It is also not my place to meddle in private affairs. Please don't take it to heart.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 사적인 일에 제가 끼어들 자리도 아니고요. 너무 마음에 담아두지 마세요.

segments.text: Be careful, everyone. We have entered the area of the Relief Shelter.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다들 조심해요, 구호소 구역에 들어섰어요.

segments.text: Wow ... the fog has risen in the woods!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 와... 숲에 안개가 끼었네!

segments.text: Come here! Hold your breath. The white fog should be a protective incantation to hide the Relief Shelter.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이리 와요! 숨을 참으세요. 저 하얀 안개는 구호소를 숨기기 위한 보호 주문일 거예요.

segments.text: It is now 35 minutes to ten.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 10시까지 35분 남았어요.

segments.text: The refugees nearby are not well, and the guards are doubled.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 근처에 있는 난민의 상황이 좋지 않아요. 경비도 많이 강화됐어요.

segments.text: From now on, everyone please proceed with caution. Ensure that you are not disturbed by the fog.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 지금부터는 움직일 때 신중에 신중을 기해야 합니다. 안개의 영향을 받지 않도록 하세요.

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 네.

segments.text: Move as much as possible before we meet Miss Vertin!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 버틴 씨를 만나기 전까지 최대한 많이 움직여!

segments.text: Good. Repeat. Transfer supplies. Rescue refugees!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 좋아요, 다시 한번 말해두죠. 물품을 옮기고 난민을 구하는 겁니다!

segments.text: Let's move!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 출발해요!

segments.text: Oh, thank you, I've been starving for so long. Hmm ... not bad! Give me another potion.
segments.speaker: President Michel
segments.translation: 오, 고마워요. 정말 오랫동안 굶주렸거든요. 음... 나쁘지 않네요! 포션 하나 더 주세요.

segments.text: Of course, suit yourself please.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 물론이죠, 마음대로 하세요.

segments.text: Oh. Ms. Druvis, you're back. Have you finished potion distribution?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 아. 드루비스 씨, 돌아오셨군요. 포션 배급은 끝내셨나요?

segments.text: Yes. Patients in the stretcher zone have also taken the potion. They are feeling a bit better.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 네. 들것 구역의 환자들도 물약을 복용했습니다. 조금 나아진 것 같아요.

segments.text: What's that smell? You just gave it out before we sample them?
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 무슨 냄새야? 우리가 맛보기도 전에 벌써 냄새를 풍기고 있는 거야?

segments.text: The press is here in no time! You have to be fully responsible for any accident!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 언론이 금세 올 거야! 사고가 나면 네가 모든 책임을 져야 한다고!

segments.text: The press?
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 언론?

segments.text: Aren't you the ones who want a press conference? Just to show off what the arcanists do in the relief!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 기자회견을 원하는 건 너희들 아니야? 구호 활동에서 마도사들이 뭘 하는지 자랑하려고 말이야!

segments.text: Hey! Gimme some potion! These toad freaks ...
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 야! 포션 좀 줘! 이 두꺼비 괴물들...

segments.text: He is too late.
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 그는 너무 늦었다.

segments.text: Following the believer, the journalists pack into the square with cameras on their shoulders, looking around the place.
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 신도를 따라 기자들이 어깨에 카메라를 메고 광장으로 몰려들어 주변을 둘러본다.

segments.text: I didn't know there will be press today.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 오늘 기자들이 올 줄은 몰랐는데.

segments.text: Forgive me for that I want to hold a banquet before the "Storm", Miss Druvis.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우 전에 연회를 열고 싶어 하는 저를 용서해 주세요, 드루비스 양.

segments.text: After all, for us Manus Vindictae, this era is no longer of any value.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어쨌든 우리 재건의 손에게 이 시대는 더 이상 아무런 가치가 없으니까.

segments.text: The potion ... tastes so familiar ... the smell ...
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 이 물약... 너무 익숙한 맛이야... 이 냄새도...

segments.text: This is prohibited! Where did you get it?! I knew it, I knew we can't trust these insane people! Get them all!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 이건 금지된 거야! 어디서 구한 거지?! 역시 그럴 줄 알았어, 이런 미친 놈들을 믿으면 안 된다고! 모조리 잡아라!

segments.text: Insane? No, we can't be more sane.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 미쳤다고? 아니야, 우리보다 정상인 사람은 없어.

segments.text: Forget Me Not turns to him, with a weird, excited smile on his face.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫이 그를 향해 돌아서며, 기묘하고 흥분된 미소를 얼굴에 띠었다.

segments.text: He has waited for so long just for this moment to show his true self.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그는 자신의 진짜 모습을 보여줄 이 순간만을 위해 그토록 오랫동안 기다려왔어.

segments.text: We are neither insane, nor ever hysterical.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리는 미치지도 않았고, 히스테리를 부리는 것도 아니야.

segments.text: Not to mention practicing hypocrisy, screwing money through all the ridiculous and absurd decrees.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 위선을 행하는 것은 물론이고, 온갖 터무니없고 황당한 법령들로 돈을 긁어모으는 것까지 말이야.

segments.text: The prohibition has lasted for almost 10 years, how could you know it's beer right away?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 금주령이 거의 10년이나 지속됐는데, 어떻게 한 번에 맥주라는 걸 알아챈 거야?

segments.text: What a hypocritical wretch!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 정말 위선적인 쓰레기군!

segments.text: Uggh ... ahh!!
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 으으윽... 아아!!

segments.text: As Forget Me Not raises his hands, people start to explode one after another. The rude officer falls down, with a broken stomach and guts all over the place.
segments.speaker: Commissioned Corpst
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫이 손을 들어 올리자, 사람들이 차례차례 폭발하기 시작한다. 무례한 장교는 배가 터져 내장이 사방에 흩어진 채 쓰러진다.

segments.text: What?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 뭐지?!

segments.text: He used the potion as fuel for explosion?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 방금 복용한 포션을 폭탄 연료로 사용한 건가?

segments.text: Distress cometh upon those not of me. Present me thy flesh, soul and abhorring.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 나와 함께하지 않는 자들에게 고통이 찾아오리라. 네 육신과 영혼, 그리고 증오를 내게 바쳐라.

segments.text: Why!!! Arrgh!!!
segments.speaker: Broke Celebrity
segments.translation: 왜!!! 아아악!!!

segments.text: I give you death, rejoice, may the wine in Heaven be without measure.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 너에게 죽음을 선사하니, 기뻐해라. 천국의 술이 무궁무진하기를.

segments.text: Don't ... don't kill me ... Arrgh!
segments.speaker: President Michel
segments.translation: 제발... 죽이지 마... 아악!

segments.text: Help! ... Run! Run!
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 도와줘! ... 도망쳐! 도망쳐!

segments.text: I will not kill you. I demand you vultures faithfully record everything that happened.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 너희를 죽이지는 않겠다. 너희 독수리들은 일어난 모든 일을 충실히 기록하라.

segments.text: I demand you see with your own eyes—how does an inferior take everything he has been deprived of.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 직접 두 눈으로 똑똑히 봐라—열등한 자가 빼앗겼던 모든 것을 어떻게 되찾는지 말이다.

segments.text: Just! Like! This!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 바로! 이렇게! 말이야!

segments.text: No! ... Help me!
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 안 돼! ... 도와줘!

segments.text: Mr. Forget Me Not.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 물망초 씨.

segments.text: The fall has gone. No need for more blood.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 가을은 지나갔다. 더 이상의 피는 필요 없어.

segments.text: What makes you doubt, Miss Druvis?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 무엇이 당신을 의심하게 만드나요, 드루비스 양?

segments.text: "The Storm" is coming, we have accomplished our missions. And everything here should be doomed!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 오고 있어, 우리는 임무를 완수했다. 그리고 여기 있는 모든 것들은 파멸할 운명이야!

segments.text: ... The "Storm" is only the "Storm". It is not destiny.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 폭풍우는 그저 폭풍우일 뿐이야. 운명이 아니라고.

segments.text: No! You ... you are ... I've met you!
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 아니야! 너는... 너는... 내가 너를 만난 적이 있어!

segments.text: You are the daughter of the late Weyerhaeuser?!
segments.speaker: Mrs. Durant
segments.translation: 당신이 고인이 된 바이어하우저의 딸이라고?!

segments.text: Those Weyerhaeusers! They burned themselves after bankruptcy...
segments.speaker: Journalist Ⅰ
segments.translation: 바이어하우저 일가 말이야! 파산하고 나서 스스로 불에 타 죽었다지...

segments.text: No, not self-burned! Their daughter who studied dark magic burned them alive!
segments.speaker: Journalist Ⅱ
segments.translation: 아니야, 자살한 게 아니라고! 흑마법을 배운 그들의 딸이 부모를 산 채로 태워 죽인 거야!

segments.text: Worth it if I take a photo of her before I die! Move! Let me take one!
segments.speaker: Journalist Ⅰ
segments.translation: 죽기 전에 저 여자 사진 한 장만 찍으면 본전이야! 비켜! 한 장만 찍게 해줘!

segments.text: Don't do this!
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그러지 마!

segments.text: Flash lights, questions after questions. Nothing different.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 플래시 터지고, 질문에 질문 꼬리를 물고. 늘 그렇듯이.

segments.text: I have not studied dark magic.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나는 흑마법을 배운 적이 없어.

segments.text: Did your parents' death have nothing to do with you? I heard they were always against you learning dark magic.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 당신 부모님의 죽음이 당신과 아무 관련이 없다고요? 부모님께서 당신이 흑마법을 배우는 것을 항상 반대하셨다고 들었는데요.

segments.text: I have not studied dark magic. I was born an arcanist.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나는 흑마법을 배운 적이 없다. 태어날 때부터 마도술사였으니까.

segments.text: Which means you decided to burn them alive because of their disapproval.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 그러니까 당신들이 반대한다는 이유로 그들을 산 채로 태워 죽이기로 결정했다는 뜻이군요.

segments.text: I did not burn them alive. The fire was caused by gasoline. They told me ... it's twenty barrels of gasoline.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 난 그들을 산 채로 태운 게 아니야. 불은 휘발유 때문에 난 거였어. 그들이 말했거든... 휘발유 20통이라고.

segments.text: It is not possible that 20 barrels of gasoline can cause such a fire. It is dark magic, Miss.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 휘발유 20배럴로는 이런 화재가 일어날 수 없어요. 이건 마도술이에요, 아가씨.

segments.text: It is said that you always objected to their plans of cutting the trees and selling the woods. So they did it at midnight to avoid you.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 당신이 항상 나무를 베고 숲을 파는 그들의 계획에 반대했다고 들었습니다. 그래서 당신을 피하려고 한밤중에 그 일을 저질렀던 거죠.

segments.text: However, you were at the scene of their death.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 하지만 당신은 그들이 죽을 당시 현장에 있었습니다.

segments.text: ... I wanted to tell them
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: ... 그들에게 말하고 싶었어

segments.text: I have just learned a new "arcane skill" ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 방금 새로운 마도술을 익혔어...

segments.text: I do hear the sound of trees. I know there is a way ... to make us all survive ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나무들의 소리가 들려. 방법이 있어... 우리 모두가 살아남을 수 있는 방법이...

segments.text: No need to sell the woods. No need to level up trees. No need to file for bankruptcy ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲을 팔 필요도 없고. 나무를 베어낼 필요도 없고. 파산 신청을 할 필요도 없고...

segments.text: We can go back to the life we had ... the kind of life they expected.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 우리는 예전 생활로 돌아갈 수 있어... 그들이 기대했던 그런 삶으로 말이야.

segments.text: So you chose to escape the debt by burning down the woods.
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 그래서 숲을 태워서 빚에서 도망치기로 선택한 거군요.

segments.text: I will find out the truth. I will find the arsonist. I will find the answer I never knew.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 진실을 밝혀내겠어. 방화범을 찾아내겠어. 내가 몰랐던 답을 찾아내겠어.

segments.text: Druvis! Druvis ...!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드루비스 씨, 드루비스 씨...!

segments.text: I will not let the woods grow.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 숲이 자라나도록 두지 않겠다.

segments.text: I will defend everything about them.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들의 모든 것을 지켜내겠어.

segments.text: I will ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나는...

segments.text: Enough! Don't live in the past!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그만! 더 이상 과거에 연연하지 말아요!

segments.text: Open your eyes!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 눈을 떠!

segments.text: Your blessing ... once brought me fortune and hope.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 당신의 축복은... 한때 제게 행운과 희망을 안겨줬어요.

segments.text: Now I will give this blessing to you. I will share my "tomorrow" with you.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이제 제가 당신에게 축복을 줄 차례네요, 그리고 저의 내일도 나눠드릴게요.

segments.text: Watch your steps. Leave with me!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 발아래의 길을 봐요, 저와 함께 여길 벗어나도록 해요!

segments.text: Vertin ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 버틴...

segments.text: My tomorrow ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 나의 내일은...

segments.text: Leave the flashlight. Get up. I'll carry you and jump out!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 손전등은 놔둬. 일어나. 내가 너를 업고 뛰어내릴게!

segments.text: ... Thank you.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 고마워.

segments.text: Are you being officious, or just revealing your sting?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 참견하는 거야, 아니면 그냥 네 가시를 드러내는 거야?

segments.text: Forget Me Not, sooner or later, you will be destroyed by your own hatred.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 포겟미낫, 언젠가는 스스로의 증오 때문에 자멸하게 되는 날이 올 거다.

segments.text: I know, but I'm sorry that you'll never live to see that day.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 알고 있어, 하지만 네가 그날을 보지 못할 거라서 미안해.

segments.text: He gets out his wand and a disciple appears behind him.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그가 지팡이를 꺼내자 그의 뒤에 제자가 나타난다.

segments.text: *roaring*
segments.speaker: Manus Messenger
segments.translation: 재건의 손 전령: "*으르렁*

segments.text: ㄐㄧㄣˇㄕㄣˊㄇㄧˋㄒㄩㄝˊㄐㄧㄚㄎㄜˇㄩㄝ
segments.speaker: Manus Messenger
segments.translation: 진심밀학가가 가능해

segments.text: So, you left in such a hurry just to get your accomplice, bumblebee.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그래서 그렇게 급하게 떠난 게 네 공범을 데려오기 위해서였구나, 꿀벌아.

segments.text: It's time to clean the garden, my disciples!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 정원을 정리할 시간이야, 내 제자들아!

segments.text: *roars*
segments.speaker: Manus Believer
segments.translation: *으르렁*

segments.text: Why ... why can't the fog be cleared? ... How can we get in?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 왜, 어째서 안개가 없어지지 않는 거죠... 어떻게 해야 들어갈 수 있는 걸까요!

segments.text: I've already heard the Timekeeper's voice. She is close to us. She needs help!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 분명 타임키퍼 목소리가 들렸어요. 이 근처에 있을 텐데... 어서 도와야 해요!

segments.text: The arcane skill on the fog is far more powerful than ours. It's countering us.
segments.speaker: APPLe
segments.translation: 안개에 걸린 마도술이 우리 것보다 훨씬 강력해요. 우리를 압도하고 있어요.

segments.text: I can't wait any longer. I don't want it to be ... like the last time ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이대로 있을 순 없어요, 저번 일을... 반복할 수는 없어요...

segments.text: There must be a way to focus all of our arcanum simultaneously.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우리가 가진 마도술의 힘을 한번에 집중시킬 방법이 분명 있을 거예요.

segments.text: As long as we're more powerful, even just for a second! ... As long as there's a breach ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 잠깐이라도 우리가 더 강하기만 하다면! ... 틈만 있다면...

segments.text: Sometimes, things can be fixed without arcanum.
segments.translation: 마도술 없이 해결되는 일도 있는 법이죠.

segments.text: Huh ...!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: It is also a good way ... to learn from human experience.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 인간의 경험을 통해 배우는 것도 좋은 방법입니다.

segments.text: Mr. X, and ... Regulus!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: X 씨, 그리고... 레굴루스?

segments.text: So the reinforcements sent by the Foundation are you guys. Excellent!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 재단에서 보낸 지원군이 여러분들이군요. 훌륭해요!

segments.text: Phew! Finally we catch up. I'm cream crackered!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 휴... 드디어 따라잡았네. 진짜 힘들어 죽겠어!

segments.text: No worries, Sonetto! We will rush in and meet Vertin!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 걱정하지 마, 소네트! 여길 뚫고 들어가서 버틴을 만나게 될 거야!

segments.text: What did you just say, Mr. X? Is there another way?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: X 씨, 방금 뭐라고 하셨죠? 다른 방법이 있다는 말씀이신가요?

segments.text: The essence of arcane power ... lies in the intuitive insight into everything.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 마도술의 본질은... 만물에 대한 직관적 통찰에 있습니다.

segments.text: And our human friends are good at logical deduction based on awareness, which is rejected by the arcanists.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 반면, 우리의 인간 친구들은 마도학자들이 배척하는 지각을 바탕으로 한 논리적 추론에 능하고요.

segments.text: Since we can't beat the Manus in terms of arcanum, then ...
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 우리가 마도술 실력으로 재건을 이길 수 없다면...

segments.text: He knocks at the weird-shaped pipe hiding under his coat.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: X는 코트 안에 숨겨둔 이상하게 생긴 파이프를 두드린다.

segments.text: Why not try to use a counter-intuitive logic experiment to open the door of this protective incantation?
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 직관적이지 않은 논리 실험으로 이 보호 주문의 문을 열어보는 게 어떻겠습니까?

segments.text: Anyway, as long as the caster can be interrupted, anything is fine.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 어쨌든, 마법을 건 사람을 방해할 수만 있다면~ 어떤 방법이든 상관없으니까요~

segments.text: Hmm, are you going to avoid the surveillance of the fog, and go directly in to break the incantation?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 음, 안개의 감시를 피해서 직접 들어가 주문을 해제하겠다는 건가요?

segments.text: What counter-intuitive experiment will you do?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 어떤 직관적이지 않은 실험을 하실 건가요?

segments.text: Heh heh, check it out.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 하하, 잘 보세요.

segments.text: The next experiment is: within three minutes, use this copper pipe to boil a pot of water in the distance!
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 다음 실험은 이겁니다. 3분 안에 이 구리 파이프로 저 멀리 있는 물 한 주전자를 끓여보세요!

segments.text: A Goldberg Machine! That explains it. Now I understand!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 골드버그 장치...! 그렇군요... 이제 알겠어요!

segments.text: How did you get it? Uhh, I think people at the Foundation are more or less freaks.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어떻게 알아낸 거야? 윽, 재단 사람들은 다들 괴짜 기질이 있는 것 같아.

segments.text: But well, the kind of machine designed to be meaningless at every step is indeed counter-intuitive.
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 하기야 이 기계도 모든 단계가 무의미하게 설계되었으니, 확실히 직관적이진 않지.

segments.text: Maybe it really will release us from the control of arcanum. Haha! It's a gas!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 정말 마도술의 제어를 뚫을 수 있을지도 몰라, 하하! 드디어 볼거리가 생겼어!

segments.text: So, please start the experiment soon! We do not have much time.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 그럼 어서 실험을 시작하죠! 남은 시간이 얼마 없어요.

segments.text: Please hold on, Timekeeper. Reinforcements are coming right away.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 조금만 더 견뎌요. 지원군이 금방 갈게요.

segments.text: There are so many of us. How many rounds can you make it through?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 우리가 이렇게 많은데, 몇 라운드나 버틸 수 있을까?

segments.text: Your good luck won't last long.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네 행운은 얼마 못 갈 거야.

segments.text: Despite the coming "Storm," or the Foundation's reinforcements, there is only one ending to your story.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다가오는 폭풍우든, 재단의 지원군이든 상관없이, 당신 이야기의 결말은 하나뿐이야.

segments.text: Ha ha! I don't care about the words of a dying man.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 하하! 죽어가는 자의 말 따위 신경 쓰지 않아.

segments.text: Miss Druvis, I've found the truth for you.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 드루비스 씨, 당신을 위해 진실을 찾아냈어요.

segments.text: The culprit to blame, the arsonist, is right here in the shelter.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 범인은, 방화범은 바로 여기 대피소에 있어.

segments.text: As long as you keep your promise to stay.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 당신이 머물겠다는 약속만 지켜준다면.

segments.text: No ... It's not important anymore ...
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 아니야... 이제 중요하지 않아...

segments.text: Not important?! He ruined everything with just 20 barrels of gasoline!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 중요하지 않다고?! 고작 휘발유 20배럴로 모든 걸 망쳐놨다고!

segments.text: That's him. Do you know who he is?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 저 사람이야. 누군지 알아?

segments.text: Arrgh ... Uggh ...
segments.speaker: Tramp
segments.translation: 으아악... 으으...

segments.text: A firefighter who lost his job because of the depression! Thought that putting out a fire could win him his job back!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 대공황 때문에 일자리를 잃은 소방관이야! 불을 끄면 다시 일자리를 되찾을 수 있을 거라고 생각했던 거지!

segments.text: Look at those hands, they set the fire, burned your families alive, burned your woods into ashes!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 저 손들을 봐, 그 손들이 불을 질렀어, 너희 가족들을 산 채로 태워 죽였고, 너희 숲을 재로 만들어버렸지!

segments.text: How could you ... how could you even forget such pain like that? Druvis!
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 어떻게... 어떻게 그런 고통까지 잊을 수 있어? 드루비스!

segments.text: Thank you, Mr. Forget Me Not.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 고마워요, 물망초 씨.

segments.text: For your help in the flames in the past. For your compassion for someone you've never met.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 과거 화염 속에서 도와주신 것에 대해. 한 번도 만난 적 없는 누군가에게 보여주신 연민에 대해.

segments.text: Today is just the same as before. In the past, I tried everything to protect something.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 오늘도 예전과 다를 게 없군. 과거에 난 무언가를 지키기 위해 모든 걸 시도해봤어.

segments.text: But before I knew it, I already stood on the opposite side of myself in the past.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 하지만 어느새 나는 과거의 나와 정반대편에 서 있었다.

segments.text: My woods will not perish.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내 숲은 사라지지 않을 것이다.

segments.text: They will live with scars, and new shoots in spring.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들은 상처와 함께 살아갈 것이고, 봄이 되면 새싹이 돋아날 거야.

segments.text: They will look haggard, but at the same time they will stand upright.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들은 초췌해 보이겠지만, 동시에 꼿꼿이 서 있을 것이다.

segments.text: They will continue to grow, recording everything about their own history, territory, residents, and an anecdote of a reckless firefighter in the 1920s.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들은 계속해서 성장하며, 자신들의 역사와 영토, 주민들, 그리고 1920년대의 무모한 소방관에 대한 일화까지 모든 것을 기록해 나갈 것이다.

segments.text: They will keep growing upwards, until they cross the millennium.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 그들은 천년을 넘어설 때까지 계속해서 위로 자라날 것이다.

segments.text: Huh ... please allow me to bid you farewell, Mr. Forget Me Not.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 흠... 미스터 물망초, 이제 작별 인사를 드려야겠군요.

segments.text: I don't understand ... I can't understand ...
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 이해할 수 없어... 이해가 안 돼...

segments.text: We belong to the future, Forget Me Not.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 우리는 미래의 일부야, 포겟미낫.

segments.text: It's raining.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 비가 내린다.

segments.text: What comes after the rain, is a bottle of boiled water pouring down on him.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 비가 내린 후에는, 끓는 물이 담긴 병이 그의 머리 위로 쏟아져 내린다.

segments.text: But he stands still.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 하지만 그는 꿈쩍도 하지 않았다.

segments.text: ... It's still February. But for you, isn't the spring already here?
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: ... 아직 2월인데. 하지만 너에게는 이미 봄이 온 거 아냐?

segments.text: I think I should go back to where I belong.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 내가 있어야 할 곳으로 돌아가야겠어.

segments.text: Flowers. More flowers. Without being noticed, they are sprouting on the scorched earth and become flower fields.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 꽃들이야. 더 많은 꽃들. 아무도 눈치채지 못한 사이에 그들은 불탄 땅에서 싹을 틔우고 꽃밭이 되어가고 있어.

segments.text: The forget-me-not flower field?! I wrote about the place ... in Rainier ... Urrgh!!!
segments.speaker: Journalist
segments.translation: 물망초 꽃밭?! 그곳에 대해 기사를 썼는데... 레이니어에서... 으악!!!

segments.text: That journalist falls down in a puddle of her own blood.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 그 기자는 자신의 피웅덩이 속에 쓰러진다.

segments.text: Footsteps are getting closer. The incantation has dispelled, and people who dispelled it are running towards here.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 발소리가 점점 가까워지고 있어. 마도술이 해제됐고, 그걸 해제한 사람들이 이쪽으로 달려오고 있어.

segments.text: These seem nothing to Forget Me Not, as he just turns around and walks to the piano.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫에게는 이런 것들이 아무것도 아닌 듯, 그는 그저 몸을 돌려 피아노 쪽으로 걸어간다.

segments.text: Next time you see a wounded snake, don't save it no more.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 다음에 다친 뱀을 봐도 구해주지 마.

segments.text: Crush it to pieces.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 산산조각 내버려.

segments.text: Smear its tongue with the ashes of despair.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 절망의 재로 그놈의 혀를 더럽혀라.

segments.text: People are coming here. This time, they are our companions.
segments.speaker: Forget Me Not
segments.translation: 포겟 미 낫: 사람들이 오고 있어. 이번엔 우리 동료들이야.

segments.text: Wow. What is that man going to do? What a terrible arcanum fluctuation ...! If I knew it I wouldn't have come in!
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 와, 저 남자는 뭘 하려는 거죠. 정말 무시무시한 마법 파동이네요...! 이럴 줄 알았으면 안 들어왔을 텐데?!

segments.text: Ahh hah? Are you having a quarrel? Looks like it poured at a bad time?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 어? 싸우고 있었어? 물 뿌릴 타이밍이 안 좋았나 보네?

segments.text: Timekeeper!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼...!

segments.text: Sonetto ... Regulus ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트... 레굴루스...?

segments.text: You're not hurt! That's great!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다치지 않으셨군요! 정말 다행이에요!

segments.text: I am sorry. You protected me when the wall fell ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 죄송해요, 벽이 무너졌을 때 당신에게 보호를 받다니...

segments.text: But I could not save you ... and even let you confront the Manus alone. ... I am sorry ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신을 구하지도 못했어요... 게다가 홀로 재건을 상대하시게 하다니... 죄송해요...

segments.text: Your hands are trembling, Sonetto ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 손을 떨고 있어, 소네트...

segments.text: Calm down. You did nothing wrong.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 진정해, 넌 잘못한 게 없어.

segments.text: We are together now, aren't we? There are more challenges for us to take.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이제 다시 만났잖아, 안 그래? 같이 풀어내야 하는 더 어려운 임무들도 아직 남았고.

segments.text: It's not the time to catch up.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 지금은 안부를 묻고 있을 때가 아니야.

segments.text: ... You ... you are right.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 흑... 마... 맞는 말씀이에요.

segments.text: We are late, but not too late ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 저희가 늦게 오긴 했지만, 아직 너무 늦진 않았어요...

segments.text: Timekeeper, I-I am so glad that you are safe and sound!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 당신이 무사해서 정말 기뻐요!

segments.text: What comes next is the final battle!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이제 마지막 전쟁을 맞이하죠...!

segments.text: This time, please let me protect you.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이번엔 제가 당신을 지킬 수 있게 해주세요!

segments.text: Forget Me Not
segments.speaker: BOSS
segments.translation: 물망초

segments.text: Oh ...! It really hurts! I got hit!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아...! 정말 아파! 맞았어!

segments.text: My Lady! Stand behind me!
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 아가씨! 제 뒤로 물러나세요!

segments.text: The piano keeps playing.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 피아노가 계속 연주되고 있어.

segments.text: Urrgh ...!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: The battle is intense. The number of the injured on both sides is still increasing ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전투가 치열해요. 양측의 부상자 수가 계속 늘어나고 있어요...

segments.text: We have assembled so many combatants ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전투에 투입할 인원을 이렇게나 많이 모았는데...

segments.text: But if that's the Manus's power, I will then need ... much more training ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 이게 재건의 실력이라면, 우리는... 앞으로 훨씬 더 노력해야겠네요...

segments.text: You are all bleeding.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 너희들 모두 피를 흘리고 있어.

segments.text: Huh!
segments.speaker: Sonetto

segments.text: You are ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신은...

segments.text: Whoa, here comes a trickier guy?!
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 우와, 귀찮은 상대가 하나 더 왔군요?!

segments.text: Heh heh ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 헤헤헤...

segments.text: We're in trouble ...!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 큰일이야...!

segments.text: Everybody, keep 50 feet away from her!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 다들 저 녀석과 50피트 이상 거리를 유지해!

segments.text: Vertin, my lovely puppet, art thou leaving?
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴, 나의 사랑스러운 인형아, 떠나는 거냐?

segments.text: Correct.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 맞습니다.

segments.text: And one day ... I will be back and beat you personally.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그리고 언젠가... 다시 돌아와서 직접 널 쓰러뜨려 주마.

segments.text: Heh heh, how wonderful.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 헤헤, 정말 멋지군.

segments.text: Lady Vertin ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴 님...

segments.text: Thou lead them, from vanity to reality, from the past to the present.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그대는 그들을 허영에서 현실로, 과거에서 현재로 이끄는도다.

segments.text: Thou seek the light, sacrifice thy body, conduct forth carrying sorrows.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그대가 빛을 찾는다면, 육신을 희생하고 슬픔을 짊어진 채 나아가라.

segments.text: Vertin, the saviour that people follow.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 버틴, 사람들이 따르는 구원자.

segments.text: Blessings be unto you, whose people shall be no more in hours.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 축복이 있기를, 몇 시간 후면 더 이상 존재하지 않을 그대의 백성들에게.

segments.text: Mayst thou be in peace ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그대에게 평안이 있기를...

segments.text: When the rain falls into the sky.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 비가 하늘로 떨어질 때.

segments.text: As always.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 늘 그렇듯이.

segments.text: As she raises her hand, black slime gathers and becomes the disciples.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그녀가 손을 들어 올리자 검은 점액이 모여 신도들의 모습을 이루었다.

segments.text: Arise.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 일어나라.

segments.text: The disciples follow her order, walking towards Vertin.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 제자들이 그녀의 명령에 따라 버틴을 향해 걸어간다.

segments.text: Be gone.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 사라져라.

segments.text: The enemy is coming! Everybody protect yourselves!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 적이 몰려온다! 다들 방어해!

segments.text: Other members of Manus Vindictae run to Arcana. They fade in the rain.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 재건의 다른 멤버들이 아르카나에게 달려간다. 그들이 빗속에서 사라져 간다.

segments.text: It's raining. Home we shall be.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 비가 내리네. 집으로 가자.

segments.text: It's hard to understand her smile.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 그녀의 미소는 이해하기 어려워.

segments.text: Leave no regrets in these final hours ...
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 이 마지막 시간에 후회는 남기지 말자...

segments.text: Goodbye.
segments.speaker: Arcana
segments.translation: 안녕.

segments.text: ... They ran away!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: ...도망가 버리다니!

segments.text: We can't relax yet. Defeat the shadows first! Please everybody hold on!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 긴장을 늦추긴 일러. 우선 이 그림자들부터 물리쳐야 해! 다들 힘내!

segments.text: The Guiding One's Creation
segments.speaker: FINAL BOSS
segments.translation: 인도자의 창조물

segments.text: Finally ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 드디어...

segments.text: Amazing! Amazing! We finally defeated the Manus scoundrels!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 대단해! 대단해! 드디어 재건의 손 놈들을 물리쳤어!

segments.text: Oops, it's really thrilling! ... I don't think I'm good for the field work.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 앗, 정말 아슬아슬했네요! ... 저는 외근 업무에 안 맞는 것 같아요.

segments.text: Those who are not injured, please take charge of the inventory, and gather all the refugees.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 다치지 않은 분들은 물품을 점검하고 난민들을 전부 모아주세요.

segments.text: Whose people shall be no more ...?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 누구의 사람들이 더 이상 존재하지 않게 되는 건가...?

segments.text: There are ... six hours left ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 이제... 6시간 남았어...

segments.text: In the following time ... symptoms will get worse ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 남은 시간 동안... 사람들의 병세가 계속 악화될 거야...

segments.text: The influence scope of the Storm Syndrome will be further expanded ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우 증후군의 범위도 더 넓어질 거고...

segments.text: How shall we spend ... the last hours? And what can I do?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 마지막 시간을 어떻게 보내야 하지... 난... 뭘 할 수 있을까...

segments.text: Let's hear everyone's wishes. How about that?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 모두의 소원을 들어보자. 어때?

segments.text: Schneider ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더...

segments.text: My lord, you're actually lying here defenceless. ... Heh Heh.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 주인님, 정말 무방비 상태로 누워 계시는군요. ... 헤헤.

segments.text: We, have been with you for a long time. No reward? No way ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 우리가 당신과 함께한 지 꽤 오래됐는데... 보상은 없는 거야? 말도 안 돼...

segments.text: Schneider, what are you doing!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 슈나이더, 무슨 짓이야!

segments.text: Don't suddenly get so close to her!
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 갑자기 그렇게 가까이 가지 마세요!

segments.text: Sonetto ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소네트...

segments.text: Timekeeper, the supplies have been counted, and are being transported to the headquarters. The refugees are also being settled.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 타임키퍼, 보급품 점검이 완료됐고 본부로 수송 중입니다. 피난민들도 안전하게 정착시키고 있어요.

segments.text: I just received the news that here is not the main target for the Manus.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 방금 들은 소식인데, 재건의 주요 목표는 여기가 아니라고 하네요.

segments.text: This morning, Arcana led other members and robbed a large amount of supplies from Washington.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 바로 오늘 아침에 아르카나가 다른 멤버들을 이끌고 워싱턴 주에서 대량의 물품을 약탈했어요.

segments.text: What is ... the next mission for us? The "Storm" ... it should be coming soon ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 우리의... 다음 임무는 뭐죠? 곧 폭풍우가 닥치겠죠...

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래.

segments.text: This time, I want to hear everyone's wishes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 난 이번에 모두의 소원을 들어보고 싶어.

segments.text: Sotheby searches all over the place, and stops before the crucible.
segments.translation: 소더비는 사방을 뒤지다가 도가니 앞에서 멈춰 섰다.

segments.text: Wow ...! How could there be such a big crucible! Amazing!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 와...! 이렇게 큰 도가니가 있을 수 있다니! 대단해!

segments.text: The potion here is ... beer? No.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 여기 있는 물약은... 맥주? 아니야.

segments.text: The formula is very similar to my hallucinogen! But it's alcoholic!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이 공식은 내 환각제와 아주 비슷해! 하지만 알코올이 들어있네!

segments.text: Oh my gosh. How did he make it! What is the most crucial material?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 어머나! 어떻게 만든 거야! 가장 중요한 재료가 뭐지?

segments.text: She dips her finger in the potion and puts it in her mouth. Soon she writes something down on the paper hastily.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 소테비는 손가락을 물약에 담근 후 입에 넣는다. 곧 그녀는 종이에 무언가를 급하게 적어 내려간다.

segments.text: Eh ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: Ah ...! That's it. I got it? I got it!!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아...! 바로 그거야. 알겠어? 알겠다고!!

segments.text: I finally got the right answer!!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 드디어 정답을 맞혔어!!

segments.text: Who is that alive and kicking young lady over there?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 저기 기운 넘치는 명랑한 아가씨는 누구야?

segments.text: She is the heir to an auction house in London, England, and helped us a lot this time.
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 영국 런던의 경매장 상속녀이고, 이번에 우리를 많이 도와줬어요.

segments.text: Oh! ☆
segments.speaker: Regulus

segments.text: Hi! Ms. Sotheby!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 이봐! 소더비 씨...!

segments.text: We're taking notes of everyone's wishes. I'd say, would you like to come and have a look?
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 모두의 소원을 기록하고 있어. 와서 한번 보지 않을래?

segments.text: Hah? Take notes of wishes?! I have many wishes! I am coming!!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 헉? 소원을 적어둔다고?! 나는 소원이 엄청 많아! 나도 갈래!!

segments.text: Come here. Just register with Vertin!
segments.speaker: Regulus
segments.translation: 얼른 와, 버틴한테 등록하면 돼!

segments.text: My wish?
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 내 소원?

segments.text: Yes.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그래.

segments.text: ... If this was the last moment in your life ... what wish would you want to make?
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ... 만약 이게 네 인생의 마지막 순간이라면... 어떤 소원을 빌고 싶어?

segments.text: My lord, are we gonna die?
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 주인님, 우리 죽는 건가요?

segments.text: We are starving for too long, my lord ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 너무 오랫동안 굶주렸습니다, 주인님...

segments.text: I want to have dinner with my family. For us Italians, that's the best moment of life.
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 가족과 함께 저녁을 먹고 싶어. 우리 이탈리아 사람들에게는 그게 인생에서 가장 좋은 순간이거든.

segments.text: Mine?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 제 소원이요?

segments.text: I have no wish ...
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 전 딱히 없는데...

segments.text: What is your wish? May I realize it for you?
segments.speaker: Sonetto
segments.translation: 당신의 소원은 뭔가요? 제가 이뤄드릴 수 있을까요?

segments.text: A few refugees have already passed out from hunger. Needless to say, you know what they need, right?
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 벌써 난민 여러 명이 허기로 쓰러졌어요. 제가 굳이 말 안 해도 그들에게 뭐가 필요한지 아시죠?

segments.text: For me, a cup of espresso would be great.
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 전 에스프레소 한 잔이면 될 것 같아요.

segments.text: I already knew the right formula for the hallucinogen! I want to realize everyone's wishes!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 환각제의 올바른 조제법은 이미 알고 있어! 모두의 소원을 이뤄주고 싶어!

segments.text: I will prepare a delicious meal!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 맛있는 요리를 준비해드릴게요!

segments.text: Hmm, wishes ...
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 흠, 소원이라...

segments.text: I think ... there is a way to address your problems, Mr. Karson.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 아마도... 당신의 고민을 해결할 방법이 있을 것 같군요, 카슨 씨.

segments.text: Enjoy the dinner Ms. Sotheby prepares for everyone tonight.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 소더비 씨가 오늘 밤 모두를 위해 준비한 저녁을 즐기세요.

segments.text: Huh!!!
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson

segments.text: The sun goes down.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 해가 지고 있군.

segments.text: The water on the ground has reached the ankle.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 바닥의 물이 발목까지 차올랐군.

segments.text: Out of the tent, a diminutive figure kneels on the ground. She seems to be murmuring.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 텐트 밖으로 나오니, 작은 체구의 인물이 땅에 무릎을 꿇고 있다. 무언가 중얼거리고 있는 것 같다.

segments.text: ... I didn't know you prayed.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...기도도 하는 줄은 몰랐네.

segments.text: You're the last one to tell me your wish.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 넌 마지막으로 소원을 말해주는 사람이야.

segments.text: ... Although you won't go, I still want to know.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...넌 떠나지 않겠지만, 그래도 알고 싶어.

segments.text: Do you want to hear my wish, my lord?
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 제 소원을 들어보시겠어요?

segments.text: Then my wish is ... don't forget me.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그럼 내 소원은... 날 잊지 말아 줘.

segments.text: Well ...
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: It's raining again.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 또 비가 오네.

segments.text: The buildings outside the suitcase start to melt, but no one mentions it.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 가방 밖의 건물들이 녹기 시작하는데, 아무도 그 얘기는 하지 않네.

segments.text: Sotheby's Chew-Chew Hallucinogen XII works. The refugees finally get to have real food.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 소테비의 츄츄 환각제 XII가 효과가 있어. 난민들이 드디어 제대로 된 음식을 먹을 수 있게 됐어.

segments.text: "Desire," as she said, is the symbol of the most important ingredient.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 욕망이라고 그녀가 말했듯이, 그것이 가장 중요한 재료의 상징이야.

segments.text: Ahh ...! I'm exhausted! How tiring it is to cook!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 아아...! 지쳤어! 요리하는 게 이렇게 힘들 줄이야!

segments.text: Finally we delivered the meals to all the refugees, but our soup became cold. Aww!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 드디어 모든 난민들에게 식사를 다 배급했지만, 우리 수프는 차가워졌네. 아아!

segments.text: Oh? Thanks to your hallucinogen, what I see happens to be a parfait ...
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: 오? 당신의 환각제 덕분에 제가 보는 건 파르페네요...

segments.text: *chewing* It also tastes the same ...
segments.speaker: X
segments.translation: *쩝쩝* 맛도 똑같네요...

segments.text: I had the souffle. Miss Sotheby, thank you for the meal.
segments.speaker: Druvis Ⅲ
segments.translation: 수플레 잘 먹었어. 소테비 양, 맛있는 식사 고마워.

segments.text: Fi-filet steak! Sorry I gotta have some more ...
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 필-필레 스테이크! 미안, 좀 더 먹어야겠어...

segments.text: Ptooey!!!
segments.speaker: Man In Black

segments.text: What happened? What's wrong?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 무슨 일이야? 뭐가 잘못된 거야?

segments.text: Whoa ... what is that tast ...
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 어... 이게 무슨 맛이...

segments.text: It tastes like corned beef, dust and baseball gloves someone just wearing it ... oh ...
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 콘비프랑 먼지, 그리고 누군가 막 신었던 야구 글러브 맛이 나는군... 어...

segments.text: *laughters*
segments.speaker: Everyone
segments.translation: *웃음소리*

segments.text: Sir, you have to believe what you see!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 선생님, 눈으로 본 걸 믿으셔야 해요!

segments.text: If you don't believe it from the bottom of your heart, even the hallucinogen won't help!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 마음 깊은 곳에서부터 믿지 않으면, 환각제도 소용없어!

segments.text: Don't be fooled by the "Storm". What I prepared for you is definitely the best food in the world!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 폭풍우에 속지 마세요. 제가 준비한 건 분명히 세상에서 가장 맛있는 음식이에요!

segments.text: *cough*
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: *기침*

segments.text: Mr. Karson! What happened to you? Is there anything that doesn't suit your appetite?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨! 무슨 일이에요? 입맛에 안 맞는 게 있나요?

segments.text: No, it tastes amazing, my lady.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 아니에요, 정말 맛있습니다, 아가씨.

segments.text: What did you eat, Mr. Karson?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨, 뭘 드셨어요?

segments.text: A burnt Welsh rabbit.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 탄 웰시 래빗이군.

segments.text: ... Ah! That's ... that's my ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: The first cheese you made when you were eight. And you burnt the tulips in the Chelsea Flower Show.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 당신이 여덟 살 때 처음 만든 치즈 말이야. 그리고 첼시 플라워 쇼에서 튤립들을 태워버린 것도.

segments.text: That's a relief to me, my lady.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 다행입니다, 아가씨.

segments.text: Please take this.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 이걸 받아주세요.

segments.text: What's this thick book ...?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이 두꺼운 책은 뭐지...?

segments.text: The records of all the important transactions and dealings of our manor, some secret lists, and the location of the treasury.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 우리 저택의 모든 중요한 거래와 업무 기록들, 몇 가지 비밀 목록들, 그리고 금고의 위치 말이야.

segments.text: These are Master and Madam's favourite wine and weekly schedules.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 이쪽은 주인님과 부인께서 즐겨 드시는 와인과 주간 일정표입니다.

segments.text: Okay. But ... the second half seems to be all about ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 알겠어. 그런데... 후반부는 전부 다음에 관한 내용인 것 같은데...

segments.text: All of your favourite menus.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 당신이 좋아하는 메뉴들을 모두 준비했습니다.

segments.text: You want different dishes every day, and new preferences every time ...
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 매일 다른 요리를 원하시고, 그때그때 새로운 취향을 보이시고...

segments.text: Hah, one is barely enough.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 하, 하나로는 턱도 없지.

segments.text: My lady, please take good care of yourself.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 아가씨, 몸조리 잘하시기 바랍니다.

segments.text: Try to get in touch with Master and Miss Moissan after everything ends.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 모든 일이 끝나면 마스터와 모아상 양에게 연락을 취해보도록 해.

segments.text: You will be a fair lady, Ms. Sotheby.
segments.speaker: Mr. Karson
segments.translation: 당신은 아름다운 숙녀가 될 거예요, 소테비 양.

segments.text: I will do my best! ... But why didn't you hand it to father in person?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 최선을 다할게요! ... 그런데 왜 아버지께 직접 전해드리지 않으신 거예요?

segments.text: Enormous sound of rain comes from outside the suitcase.
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 가방 밖에서 엄청난 빗소리가 들려와.

segments.text: Whoa ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 우와...

segments.text: What a heavy rain outside ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 밖에 비가 정말 많이 내리네...

segments.text: The rain turned upside down! Oh my ...
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 비가 거꾸로 내리고 있어! 어머나...

segments.text: Come and see! Mr. Karson, quick!
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 이리 와서 봐! 카슨 씨, 빨리!

segments.text: ... Hmm?
segments.speaker: Sotheby

segments.text: Mr. Karson ... where are you?
segments.speaker: Sotheby
segments.translation: 카슨 씨... 어디 계세요?

segments.text: The "Storm" is here.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 폭풍우가 오고 말았어...

segments.text: Thanks for your treat ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 대접해줘서 고마워...

segments.text: I-I can have one ... more ...
segments.speaker: Man In Black
segments.translation: 나... 나는 하나 더... 할 수 있어...

segments.text: Holy Mary pray for us … Holy Mary pray for us …
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 성모 마리아여 저희를 위하여 빌어주소서… 성모 마리아여 저희를 위하여 빌어주소서…

segments.text: Look after us ... Have compassion on us ...
segments.speaker: Marian
segments.translation: 우리를 돌봐주세요... 우리에게 자비를 베풀어주세요...

segments.text: Don't be afraid, sis. Take my hand. Close your eyes ... Just like when we were born ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 무서워하지 마, 누나. 내 손을 잡아. 눈을 감아... 우리가 태어났을 때처럼...

segments.text: Everything will be fine ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 모든 게 괜찮아질 거야...

segments.text: ... Goodbye.
segments.speaker: Vertin

segments.text: *cough* ... My lord ...
segments.speaker: Schneider

segments.text: Schneider ... I'm sorry.
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 슈나이더... 정말 미안해.

segments.text: Your family ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 네 가족이...

segments.text: No, my lord.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 아니요, 각하.

segments.text: She stands on her feet, runs towards Vertin and falls into her embrace gently. Now, once again, she looks like a pale pigeon.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 그녀는 일어서서 버틴을 향해 달려가 부드럽게 그녀의 품에 안긴다. 이제 다시 한번, 그녀는 창백한 비둘기처럼 보인다.

segments.text: Hold me.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 날 안아줘.

segments.text: I am sorry. I'm not a real arcanist.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 미안해. 난 진짜 마도사가 아니야.

segments.text: What do you mean? I-I don't understand ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 그게 무슨 뜻이야, 무슨 말인지 모르겠어...

segments.text: I always wanted to be lucky, but ... I think I should say goodbye now.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 난 항상 운이 좋았으면 했는데... 이제 작별 인사를 해야 할 것 같아.

segments.text: Goodbye?! You mean the "Storm" will also ...
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 작별 인사? 그러니까... 너도 폭풍우에...?

segments.text: No!!! Why? ... You've never eaten the gold bar in front of us!!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: 안 돼!!! 왜? ... 당신은 우리 앞에서 금괴를 먹은 적이 없잖아!!

segments.text: Are you always tolerating it?!
segments.speaker: Vertin
segments.translation: ...계속 참아왔던 거야?!

segments.text: Heh heh ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 헤헤...

segments.text: Now it's coming, my lord ...
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 이제 오고 있습니다, 주인님...

segments.text: Don't forget me.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 나를 잊지 마.

segments.text: Don't forget my heartbeat on the right.
segments.speaker: Schneider
segments.translation: 내 심장이 오른쪽에서 뛰는 걸 잊지 마.
